cháxún dìzhǐ 
inquire about sb.\'s address

dáfù tā de xúnwèn 
reply to his inquiry

xúnwèn wǒmen de xuéxí qíngkuàng

xúnwèn bìnɡzhuànɡ

Shì yǐ zhìcǐ，hébì zài zhuīxún ne。

不得不承认，俄罗斯仍落后于她的几个主要的工业竞争者。
We kept silent for the sake of maintaining peaceful relations with Russia.
Wèile wéichí hé Éluósī de hépíng guānxi，wǒmen yìzhí zài bǎochí chénmò。
为了维持和俄罗斯的和平关系，我们一直在保持沉默。
Russians need a way to transfer those ideas into workable policies.
Éluósīrén xūyào yì zhǒng fāngfǎ bǎ nàxiē xiǎngfǎ zhuǎnbiàn chéng kěxíng de zhèngcè。
俄罗斯人需要一种方法把那些想法转变成可行的政策。
My Russian pen pal and I have been corresponding for several years.
Wǒ hé wǒ de Éluósī bǐyǒu yǐjīng liánxì hǎo jǐ nián le。
我和我的俄罗斯笔友已经联系好几年了。
The Russians exported marxism to Africa.
Éluósīrén xiàng Fēizhōu chuánbō mǎkèsīzhǔyì。
俄罗斯人向非洲传播马克思主义。
Slavery was abolished in the mid-19th century in America and in Russia.
shíjiǔshìjìzhōngyè，Měiguó hé éluósī fèichúle núlìzhì。
19世纪中叶，美国和俄罗斯废除了奴隶制。
The thaw between the United States and Russia has led to increased cooperation in world affairs.
Měiguó hé éluósī jiān guānxi de jiědòng dǎozhìle tāmen zài guójìshìwù shàng hézuò de zēngjiā。
美国和俄罗斯间关系的解冻导致了它们在国际事务上合作的增加。
She likes to read Russian novels.
Tā xǐhuan yuèdú Éluósī xiǎoshuō。
她喜欢阅读俄罗斯小说。
He represented this book as an example of the Russian 19th century novel.
Tā bǎ zhè bù zhùzuò tuījiàn wéi shíjiǔ shìjì Éluósī xiǎoshuō de diǎnfàn。
他把这部著作推荐为19世纪俄罗斯小说的典范。
Russia and the united states discussed the dismantling of their nuclear weapons.
Éluósī hé Měiguó tǎolùnle qí héwǔqì de xiāohuǐ wèntí。
俄罗斯和美国讨论了其核武器的销毁问题。
They are presently attempting to gain a foothold in the russian market.
Tāmen mùqián zhèngzài nǔlì zhēngqǔ zài Éluósī shìchǎng yíngdé yìxízhīdì。
他们目前正在努力争取在俄罗斯市场赢得一席之地。
The Russian government centralized the distribution of food.
Éluósī zhèngfǔ jízhōng fēnpèi shíwù。
俄罗斯政府集中分配食物。
Russia was slowly stalinized after Lenin\'s death.
Lièníng sǐhòu，Éluósī zhújiàn Sīdàlínhuà le。
列宁死后，俄罗斯逐渐斯大林化了。
Russia must be reintegrated into Europe.
Éluósī bìxū chóngxīn róngrù Ōuzhōu。
俄罗斯必须重新融入欧洲。
Vodka is an unaged liquor from russia.
Fútèjiā shì yì zhǒng chǎn zì Éluósī de jiǔ，bú shì chénnián lǎoniàng。
伏特加是一种产自俄罗斯的酒，不是陈年老酿。
China is wooing Russia.
Zhōngguó zhèngzài zhēngqǔ Éluósī de zhīchí。
中国正在争取俄罗斯的支持。
Relations between Russia and Ukraine have always been difficult.
éluósī yǔ Wūkèlán zhījiān de guānxi xiànglái bùhǎo。
俄罗斯与乌克兰之间的关系向来不好。
America matters far more to China than Russia does.
duì Zhōngguó éryán，Měiguó yuǎn bǐ éluósī zhòngyào。
对中国而言，美国远比俄罗斯重要。
They reacted irrationally to the challenge of Russian power.
Tāmen duì éjūn de tiǎoxìn zuòchūle hěn bù lǐzhì de fǎnyìng。
他们对俄军的挑衅做出了很不理智的反应。
The general disposed three divisions on the border to Russia.
这位将军在俄国边境布置了三个师。
Russian intelligence sees U.S. military buildup on Iran border.
俄国的情报部门发现美军在伊朗边境的军备有所增加。
俄国诗人普希金死于决斗。
Far sooner than anyone thought possible, the Russians exploded an atomic bomb.
Éguórén bàozhà dì-yī kē yuánzǐdàn de shíjiān bǐ suǒyǒurén yùliào de kěnéng shíjiān zǎo de duō。

We should consider this problem from the viewpoint of the russians.
Wǒmen yīnggāi zhànzài éguórén de lìchǎng kǎolǜ zhè yī wèntí。
我们应该站在俄国人的立场考虑这一问题。
The Russians called their astronauts cosmonauts.
Éguórén bǎ tàikōngrén jiào yǔhángyuán。
俄国人把太空人叫宇航员。
The general conviction that our side is in the right and acting defensively over what Russians call the German question and Americans the Berlin crisis.
Zài Éguórén chēngzhīwéi Déguó wèntí、 Měiguórén chēngzhīwéi Bólín wēijī de zhè jiàn shì shàng，rénmen shēnxìn wǒmen shì zhèngyì de，bìngqiě shǔyú zhèngdàngfángwèi。
在俄国人称之为德国问题、美国人称之为柏林危机的这件事上，人们深信我们是正义的，并且属于正当防卫。
The death rate in Russia has been stably high.
Éguó de rénkǒu sǐwánglǜ yìzhí yǐlái dōu gāojūbúxià。
俄国的人口死亡率一直以来都高居不下。
Russia is a wonderful country, I really love that place
俄罗斯是个迷人的国家，我非常喜欢那里。
沙皇俄国对邻国采取了蚕食政策。

Tsarist Russia adopted a policy of encroaching on its neighbours.
沙俄曾割占中国东北和西北的大片领土。

They defected because russian dance was in a straitjacket.

He took a course in Russian lit.
Tā xuéle yì mén éguó wénxué fāngmiàn de kèchéng。

Russia was slowly destalinized in the late 1950\'s.

俄顷
éqǐng
in a moment; presently
刚才明明还是晴天，俄而暴雨骤降。
Gāngcái míngmíng háishi qíngtiān，é\'ér bàoyǔ zhòujiàng。
It was sunny just now, and the next moment a rainstorm came.
她俄尔回首，满面娇羞。
Tā é\'ěr huíshǒu,mǎnmiàn jiāoxiū.
When she turned, I saw her face was red.
他早就说过要来看我，却一直俄延至今。
Tā zǎo jiù shuō guò yào lái kàn wǒ，què yìzhí éyán zhìjīn。
A long time ago he said he would come visit me but he still hasn\'t.
这枚戈比是一个俄罗斯叔叔给的。
Zhè méi gēbǐ shì yígè Éluósī shūshu gěi de。
The kopeck was given by an uncle from Russia.
沙俄曾割占中国东北和西北的大片领土。

Vodka is a famous type of spirit in Russia.
俄罗斯选手表演的水上芭蕾真是一绝。
Éluósī xuǎnshǒu biǎoyǎn de shuǐshàng bāléi zhēnshì yìjué。

men of Ohio
来自俄亥俄的人

俄罗斯的标准流通货币是卢比。

她原来是学俄语的，但最近改学了生物。

我们从未去过俄罗斯。

俄罗斯是个迷人的国家，我非常喜欢那里。

Dorothea drank Russian tea in a tall glass with a silver holders.

Tā duì gōngzī dīyú tóngshì gǎndào fènfènbùpíng。
她对工资低于同事感到愤愤不平。
人们为他受到的不公正待遇愤愤不平。
Rénmen wèi tā shòudào de bùgōngzhèng dàiyù fènfènbùpíng。
People are indignant at the unfair treatment he received.
他还是有些愤愤不平的情绪。
Tā háishi yǒuxiē fènfènbùpíng de qíngxù。
He was still smouldering with indignation.

The person who caused the car accident ran away, which aroused strong indignation among the witnesses.
他的傲慢无礼激起了大家的愤怒。
Tā de àomànwúlǐ jīqǐ le dàjiā de fènnù。
His overbearing insolence angered everyone.
愤怒的群众要求毙了这个杀人犯。

The angry masses demanded that the murderer be shot.

biǎoshì fènkǎi 
voice (or express) one\'s indignation
遏制愤怒的情绪
èzhì fènnù de qíngxù
check one\'s anger
发愤工作
fāfèn gōngzuò
put all one\'s energies into one\'s work

wèi mín píngfèn

Everybody was indignant at such an overbearing manner.

他站着看她， 沉着脸，颚部的肌肉在气愤地跳动。
She turned to face him, her face flushed with anger.
Tā zhuǎnguò shēn lái kànzhe tā，yì liǎn fènnù。
她转过身来看着他，一脸愤怒。
It was the betrayal of her trust that made her flutter with anger.
Biérén de bèipàn lìng tā shífēn fènnù。
别人的背叛令她十分愤怒。
Anger is not the weapon to use when battling with them.
Zài yǔ tāmen zhēngdòu de shíhou，yòng fènnù zuò wǔqì shì méiyǒuyòng de。
在与他们争斗的时候，用愤怒作武器是没有用的。
I\'m sure his mother would be spitting feathers if she knew what her son was doing.
Wǒ kěyǐ kěndìng tā māma huì fēicháng de fènnù，dāng zhīdào érzi suǒzuò de shì。
我可以肯定他妈妈会非常的愤怒，当知道儿子所做的事。
Her fury was boiling over.
Tā de fènnù dàole bàofādiǎn。
她的愤怒到了爆发点。
I felt my anger boil up inside me.
Wǒ gǎndào fènnù zài wǒ de xīnzhōng jiājù。
我感到愤怒在我的心中加剧。
Her father caught a hold of the raging bull.
Tā fùqīn zhuāzhù fènnù de gōngniú。
她父亲抓住愤怒的公牛。
He chucked off the football in anger.
Tā fènnù de bǎ zúqiú rēngdiào。
他愤怒地把足球扔掉。
The confusion and anger were slowly clearing from her head.
Yíhuò hé fènnù mànmàn cóng tā tóunǎo lǐ qūsàn。
疑惑和愤怒慢慢从她头脑里驱散。
The angry coach was coming over his players.
Fènnù de jiàoliàn duì tā de duìyuánmen bǎiqǐle jiàzǐ。
愤怒的教练对他的队员们摆起了架子。
She probably hadn\'t got over being angry; she needed time to cool down.
Tā kěnéng hái wèi cóng fènnù zhōng huīfù guòlái，shàng xū shíjiān lěngjìng。
她可能还未从愤怒中恢复过来，尚需时间冷静。
He always corks up his emotions and explodes in anger.
Tā jīngcháng yāyì tā de qíngxù，fènnù de bàofā。
他经常压抑他的情绪，愤怒地爆发。
She felt her bones weaken in fear，though now his anger was not directed against her.
Jǐnguǎn mùqián tā bìng méiyǒu bǎ fènnù de máotóu zhǐxiàng tā，dàn tā què juéde zìjǐ de gǔtou dōu xiàde ruǎnpāpā le。
尽管目前他并没有把愤怒的矛头指向她，但她却觉得自己的骨头都吓得软趴趴了。
Alice\'s angry flush faded to pale anxiety.
Àilìsī yóu fènnù de liǎn hóng biàndàole bù\'ān de cāngbái。
爱丽丝由愤怒的脸红变到了不安的苍白。
He was filled with anger and rage.
Tā mǎnqiāngfènnù。
他满腔愤怒。

Wǒ huǒmàosānzhàng，fènnù zhíjiē bàofā。
我火冒三丈，愤怒直接爆发。
He flung out the door in anger.
Tā fènrán zǒuchū mén qù。
他愤然走出门去。
He foamed with rage，and told me that it was my turn this time.
Tā fēicháng qìfèn，bìng gàosu wǒ zhè cì gāi wǒ le。
他非常气愤，并告诉我这次该我了。
Instead of thinking about it she gave mouth to her anger.
Tā méiyǒu zài kǎolǜ，érshì shuōchūle tā de fènnù。
她没有再考虑，而是说出了她的愤怒。
But then, with a sudden rush, his fear gave place to rage.
Búguò，shìfātūrán，tā de kǒngjù bèi fènnù suǒ tìdài。
不过，事发突然，他的恐惧被愤怒所替代。
Tears of rage were gushing from her eyes.
Fènnù de yǎnlèi cóng tā yǎnlǐ duókuàng\'érchū。
愤怒的眼泪从她眼里夺眶而出。
He hit against the wall in anger.
Tā fènnù de zhuàngdào qiáng shàng。
他愤怒地撞到墙上。
He kicked about the dirt in anger.
Tā fènnù de zài tǔ lǐ luàn tī。
他愤怒地在土里乱踢。

Wǒ xiǎng shuō zhèxiē gèng duō de shì bēishāng ér búshì fènhèn。
我想说这些更多的是悲伤而不是愤恨。

Shāngdiàn lǐ chōngmǎnle fènnù de xiāofèizhě。

Tā yìzhì zhù fènnù。

Tā fènnù de guānshàng mén。
他愤怒地关上门。

Tā shìtú ràng chǔyú jídù fènnù de rén lěngjìng xiàlái。

Tā de xíngwéi díquè ràng wǒ gǎndào fènnù。

仰望星空
yǎngwàngxīngkōng
look up at the starlit sky
他躺在如茵的碧草上仰望天空。
Tā tǎng zài rúyīn de bìcǎo shàng yǎngwàng tiānkōng。
He lied on the grass, watching the sky.
仰望碧天，他的心情豁然开朗。
Yǎngwàng bìtiān，tā de xīnqíng huōrán kāilǎng。
Looking up at the open sky, he suddenly cheered up.
我仰望河汉，心里在思考着那个困扰我已久的问题。
Wǒ yǎngwàng héhàn，xīnlǐ zài sīkǎo zhe nàge kùnrǎo wǒ yǐjiǔ de wèntí。
Looking up at the milky way, I am thinking over the question that has been perplexing me for a long time.
抬头仰望，峻拔的山峰直插到了云里。
Táitóu yǎngwàng，jùnbá de shānfēng zhí chādào le yúnlǐ。
Looking up, the high and steep mountain went directly into the clouds.
他仰望天空狂呼，抱怨命运的不公平！
Tā yǎngwàng tiānkōng kuánghū，bàoyuàn mìngyùn de bùgōngpíng！
Looking up at the sky, he shouts and complains about the  unfairness of fate.
我抬头仰望，只见天空中罗布着点点繁星。
Wǒ táitóu yǎngwàng，zhǐjiàn tiānkōng zhōng luóbù zhe diǎndiǎn fánxīng。
I looked up and saw numerous stars scattered in the sky.
他抬头仰望星汉，不禁感到一阵悲伤。
Tā táitóu yǎngwàng xīnghàn，bùjīn gǎndào yízhèn bēishāng。
He looked up at the Milky Way and couldn\'t help feeling a pang of sadness.
岳飞在满江红中写道：“抬望眼，仰天长啸，壮怀激烈” 。
Yuè Fēi zài mǎnjiānghóng zhōng xiědào:“tái wàng yǎn，yǎngtiān chángxiào，zhuànghuái jīliè”。
Yue Fei wrote in his Ci (a traditional Chinese poem) Man Jiang Hong,&quot;Lifting my eyes; towards the sky I let out a battle cry;\nmy blood is boiling.&quot;
仰望星空。

The building seen from below looks so high.
从下面仰望会觉得这个建筑物很高。
Grace was looking up at the stars with a telescope.
Gélěisī zhèng yòng yí jià wàngyuǎnjìng yǎngwàngxīngkōng。
格蕾丝正用一架望远镜仰望星空。
She looked up at the flawless blue sky, dotted with a few drifting white clouds.
Tā yǎngwàngzhe báiyún diǎnzhuì de wúxiá lántiān。
她仰望着白云点缀的无瑕蓝天。

Yuè Fēi zài mǎnjiānghóng zhōng xiědào:“tái wàng yǎn，yǎngtiān chángxiào，zhuànghuái jīliè”。
Yue Fei wrote in his Ci (a traditional Chinese poem) Man Jiang Hong,&quot;Lifting my eyes; towards the sky I let out a battle cry;\nmy blood is boiling.&quot;
仰视天空
yǎngshì tiānkōng

他躺在如茵的碧草上仰望天空。
Tā tǎng zài rúyīn de bìcǎo shàng yǎngwàng tiānkōng。
He lied on the grass, watching the sky.
他仰望天空狂呼，抱怨命运的不公平！
Tā yǎngwàng tiānkōng kuánghū，bàoyuàn mìngyùn de bùgōngpíng！
Looking up at the sky, he shouts and complains about the  unfairness of fate.
仰面朝天
yǎngmiàn cháotiān
lie on one\'s back
仰望碧天，他的心情豁然开朗。
Yǎngwàng bìtiān，tā de xīnqíng huōrán kāilǎng。
Looking up at the open sky, he suddenly cheered up.
我们之间的信仰有着天壤之别。
Wǒmen zhījiān de xìnyǎng yǒuzhe tiānrǎngzhībié。
Our beliefs are poles apart.
我抬头仰望，只见天空中罗布着点点繁星。
Wǒ táitóu yǎngwàng，zhǐjiàn tiānkōng zhōng luóbù zhe diǎndiǎn fánxīng。
I looked up and saw numerous stars scattered in the sky.
我可是久仰尊夫人的芳名，今天才有幸见到。
Wǒ kěshì jiǔyǎng zūnfūrén de fāngmíng，jīntiān cái yǒuxìng jiàndào。
I have heard of your wife for a long time. Today, I finally have the honor of meeting her.

The area is made up predominantly of Catholic people.
Zhège dìqū juédàduōshù de rénmín xìnyǎng tiānzhǔjiào。
这个地区绝大多数的人民信仰天主教。
Martyrs may die every day for their faith.
Kěnéng měi tiān dōu yǒu xùndàozhě wèi xìnyǎng ér sǐ。
可能每天都有殉道者为信仰而死。

仰人鼻息。
仰人鼻息。

仰赖。
仰赖救援。
他光风霁月的胸襟令人敬仰。
Tā guāngfēng jìyuè de xiōngjīn lìngrén jìngyǎng。
His broad mind receives great respect from others.
久仰，久仰！幸会，幸会！
Jiǔyǎng，jiǔyǎng！Xìnghuì，xìnghuì！
I am most honoured to meet you after hearing so much about you!

búlùn zhǒngzú、xìnyǎng huò fūsè

suírén fǔyǎng

他信仰佛教，颂佛经，吃长斋。
Tā xìnyǎng fójiào，sòng fójīng，chī chángzhāi。
He believes in Buddhism, recites Buddhist scriptures, and abstains from eating meat and fish year round.
一直以来，我都非常崇仰这位老先生。
Yìzhí yǐlái，wǒ dōu fēicháng chóngyǎng zhèwèi lǎoxiānshēng。
I have always been admired this elderly gentleman.
仰卧起坐是锻炼腹部肌肉的有效办法。
Yǎngwò qǐzuò shì duànliàn fùbùjīròu de yǒuxiào bànfǎ。
Doing sit-ups is an effective way to exercise abdominal muscles.
他光风霁月的胸襟令人敬仰。
Tā guāngfēng jìyuè de xiōngjīn lìngrén jìngyǎng。
His broad mind receives great respect from others.
我仰望河汉，心里在思考着那个困扰我已久的问题。

Looking up at the milky way, I am thinking over the question that has been perplexing me for a long time.
他信仰的红教在西藏流传得很广。
Tā xìnyǎng de hóngjiào zài Xīzàng liúchuán de hěnguǎng。
The Red Hats he believed in spread widely in Tibet.
十分疲惫的他，后仰在椅子上就睡着了。
Shífēn píbèi de tā，hòuyǎng zài yǐzi shàng jiù shuìzháo le。
He was so tired that he fell asleep, as soon as he leaned back in the chair.
他是社会未来一代应当敬仰和为之继业的榜样。
Tā shì shèhuì wèilái yídài yīngdāng jìngyǎng hé wéizhī jìyè de bǎngyàng。
He is an example for our society of what should be honored and continued in the future.
抬头仰望，峻拔的山峰直插到了云里。
Táitóu yǎngwàng，jùnbá de shānfēng zhí chādào le yúnlǐ。
Looking up, the high and steep mountain went directly into the clouds.
他仰望天空狂呼，抱怨命运的不公平！
Tā yǎngwàng tiānkōng kuánghū，bàoyuàn mìngyùn de bùgōngpíng！
Looking up at the sky, he shouts and complains about the  unfairness of fate.
他看起来蔫蔫的，但偶尔发一句冷炮，就会逗得大家前仰后合。
Tā kànqǐlái niānniān de，dàn ǒuěr fā yíjù lěngpào，jiùhuì dòu de dàjiā qiányǎng hòuhé。
He looks listless, but occasional he will say something unexpected and make others burst out laughing.
我一直久仰令尊的大名，不知何时可见上一面。

I’ve long been looking forward to meeting your father, and I’ve no idea when this dream can come true.

I looked up and saw numerous stars scattered in the sky.
这椅子不结实，别在上面前俯后仰地乱动。

The chair isn\'t very sturdy. Don\'t move backwards and forwards when you are on it.
鲁迅是我最钦仰的大作家。
Lǔxùn shì wǒ zuì qīnyǎng de dàzuòjiā。
Luxun is the great writer I respect and admire most.
我久闻先生的清誉，十分敬仰。
Wǒ jiǔwén xiānshēng de qīngyù，shífēn jìngyǎng。
I\'ve been hearing about your unblemished reputation for a long time, and greatly respect you.
李老先生是位宿儒，大家都很敬仰他。

Senior old Li is an experienced and knowledgeable scholar, and is respected by all.
他虽屡次受挫，但宿志不改，始终坚持自己的信仰。
Tā suī lǚcì shòucuò，dàn sùzhì bùgǎi，shǐ zhōng jiānchí zìjǐ de xìnyǎng。
Despite continuous setbacks, he didn\'t change his long-cherished ambition, and stuck to his faith.
他抬头仰望星汉，不禁感到一阵悲伤。
Tā táitóu yǎngwàng xīnghàn，bùjīn gǎndào yízhèn bēishāng。
He looked up at the Milky Way and couldn\'t help feeling a pang of sadness.
他一仰脖，把一瓶酒都喝了。
Tā yì yǎngbó，bǎ yì píng jiǔ dōu hē le。
He raised his head and drank the whole bottle of beer.
我们需要仰承中华民族的传统美德。
Wǒmen xūyào yǎngchéng zhōng huá mínzú de chuántǒng měidé。
We should develop the traditional virtues of the Chinese nation.
你别总是仰承他的意见，要有自己的主见。
Nǐ bié zǒngshì yǎngchéng tā de yìjiàn，yào yǒu zìjǐ de zhǔjiàn。
Don\'t rely on his ideas, be your own master.
我现在只能仰承你的意愿了 。
Wǒ xiànzài zhǐnéng yǎngchéng nǐ de yìyuàn le。
I cannot but comply with your wishes now.
游泳池里都是仰浮的人群，大家玩得很开心。
Yóuyǒngchí lǐ dōushì yǎngfú de rénqún，dàjiā wán de hěn kāixīn。
The swimming pool is full of people who are doing the backstroke, they are having fun.
我们都长大了，总不能仰给父母一辈吧 。
Wǒmen dōu zhǎngdà le，zǒng bùnéng yǎnggěi fùmǔ yíbèi ba。
We are grown-up now, we can\'t rely on our parents for support.
他仰靠着墙，装酷呢。
Tā yǎngkào zhe qiáng，zhuāng kù ne。
He is leaning on the wall, pretending to be cool.
他总是仰靠他父母，一点主见都没有。
Tā zǒngshì yǎngkào tā fùmǔ，yìdiǎn zhǔjiàn dōu méiyǒu。
He has no definite ideas of his own and always relies on his parents.
现在谁都仰赖不了，你还是靠自己吧。
Xiànzài shuí dōu yǎnglài bùliǎo，nǐ háishi kào zìjǐ ba。
You can rely on nobody now, so count on yourself.

We are lying on our backs, looking at the stars in the sky.
你仰头看见什么了。
Nǐ yǎngtóu kànjiàn shénme le。
What did you see when you raised your head?
我对您的景仰之情有若滔滔江水，绵延不绝。
Wǒ duì nín de jǐngyǎng zhī qíng yǒuruò tāotāo jiāngshuǐ，miányán bùjué。
My admiration for you is like the unceasing flow of a river.
看到他这身可爱的妆束，女朋友笑得前仰后合。

Blind faith in science is no improvement upon blind faith in religion.

Mystics often have different beliefs which inevitably affect their experience.

Faith in each other is a lifelong process, beginning with trust in God.

她热切地要捍卫自己的信仰。

丈夫去世后，是宗教信仰支撑着她活了下去。

战争期间，出于政治或宗教信仰的原因，有些人会被囚禁，甚至会被杀害。
Religious faith is a conversation stopper.
一谈到宗教信仰问题就会冷场。

to hold court

to kill o.s. (laughing {or} with laughter)

过去我都依赖进口的洋油。
Guòqù wǒ dōu yīlài jìnkǒu de yángyóu。

依赖
有依赖思想。
一味依赖行政保护，企业只能走进死胡同。

种植业和农产品加工业互相依赖。
He is dependent on his old brother for support.
他完全依赖他哥哥的资助。
She still depends on her parents.
她仍然依赖父母生活。
to rely heavily on {or} be heavily reliant on sb/sth
过分依赖某人/某物
A country will become a client to other countries if it relies on the country economically.
一个国家如果经济上依赖另一个国家，那她就会变成那个国家的附庸。
The party cannnot rely on the achievements of the past decade to win the next election.

这一政党不能依赖过去十年的成就来赢得下次竞选。

Zhèxiē tiáojiàn báizhǐhēizì，yìqīng\'èrchǔ，xiǎng dǐlài shì dǐlài bú diào de。
These terms are clearly written in black and white. You can never deny them.
赖是赖不掉的。
Lài shì lài bu diào de。
It\'s no good trying to deny it. or You simply can\'t deny it.
百般抵赖
bǎibān dǐlài 
try by every means to deny
百无聊赖时我就随手抓过一本书来，强迫自己看下去。
Bǎiwúliáolài shí wǒ jiù suíshǒu zhuāguò yìběnshū lái，qiǎngpò zìjǐ kànxiàqù。
In times of sheer boredom I would pick up a book and force myself to read.
今年的庄稼可真不赖。
Jīnnián de zhuāngjia kě zhēn búlài。
This year\'s crops are really fine.
他为人诚笃，可以信赖。
Tā wéirén chéngdǔ，kěyǐ xìnlài。
He\'s sincere and earnest, and so can be trusted.
不容抵赖
bùróng dǐlài 
brook no denial
事实是抵赖不了的。
Shìshí shì dǐlài bùliǎo de。
Denying the facts is futile. or Facts cannot be denied.
证据确凿，不容狡赖。
Zhèngjù quèzáo，bùróngjiǎolài。
It\'s no use denying it; the evidence is conclusive.
赖以生存的条件
lài yǐ shēngcún de tiáojiàn
conditions on which persons or things rely (or depend) for existence
赖着不走
lài zhe bùzǒu
hang on and refuse to clear out
自己错了还赖别人，这就不对了。
Zìjǐ cuò le hái lài biérén，zhè jiù búduì le。
It\'s not right to blame others for one\'s own mistake.
这事全赖我。
Zhè shì quán lài wǒ。
I\'m entirely to blame for that.
好的赖的我都能吃。
Hǎo de lài de wǒ dōu néng chī。
I can eat anything, good or bad .
耍赖皮
shuǎ làipí
act shamelessly
证据确凿，不容抵赖。
Zhèngjù quèzáo，bùróngdǐlài。
The evidence is conclusive and brooks no denial.
诬赖好人
wūlài hǎorén 
incriminate innocent people
耍无赖
shuǎ wúlài 
act shamelessly
不要养成依赖别人的心理。
Búyào yǎngchéng yīlài biérén de xīnlǐ。
Don\'t get into the habit of depending on others.
一个信口雌黄的无赖
yígè xìnkǒucíhuáng de wúlài
a shameless liar and scoundrel
她是群众信赖的好干部。
Tā shì qúnzhòngxìnlài de hǎo gànbù。
She\'s a good cadre trusted by the masses.
依赖别人
yīlài biérén 
be dependent on others
依赖思想
yīlài sīxiǎng
the dependent mentality
依赖性
yīlàixìnɡ 
dependence
要实现这项革新，有赖于大家共同努力。
Yào shíxiàn zhè xiàng géxīn，yǒulài yú dàjiā gòngtóngnǔlì。
The success of the innovation depends on our concerted efforts.
赖皮
làipí
rascally; shameless; unreasonable
他为人沉厚，值得信赖。
Tā wéirén chénhòu，zhídé xìnlài。
He is a sincere person and worth your trust.
你不能这样刁赖，不讲道理！
Nǐ bùnéng zhèyàng diāolài，bùjiǎng dàolǐ！
You can\'t be so tricky and unreasonable!
他为人一向正直笃诚，深得大家的信赖。
Tā wéirén yí xiàng zhèngzhí dǔchéng，shēndé dàjiā de xìnlài。
He is a sincere and credible man who has earned the trust of all.
他出身名门豪族，但自立自强，从不依赖家里。
Tā chūshēn míngmén háozú，dàn zìlì zìqiáng，cóngbùyīlài jiā lǐ。
He is born into a wealthy and influential family, but he is independent and self-supportive.
虽说他上的学校不好，但他好赖是个大学生。
Suīshuō tā shàng de xuéxiào bùhǎo，dàn tā hǎolài shì gè dàxuésheng。
He is still a university graduate, even though his university isn\'t famous.
他宦游一生，是皇上最信赖的臣下。
Tā huànyóu yìshēng，shì huángshàng zuì xìnlài de chénxià。
He has been an official all his life ,and is the one the Emperor trusted most.
我们的身体需要适量地补充赖氨酸。
Wǒmen de shēntǐ xūyào shìliàng de bǔchōng làiānsuān。
We should supplement with lysine for our health.
他动不动就赖学，这种情况应该及时向家长反映。
Tā dòngbudòng jiù làixué，zhèzhǒng qíngkuàng yīnggāi jíshí xiàng jiāzhǎng fǎnyìng。
We should tell his parents that he often shirks school.
农民赖以生存的土地就这样被污染毁掉了！
Nóngmín làiyǐ shēngcún de tǔdì jiù zhèyàng bèi wūrǎn huǐdiào le！
The land on which farmers rely for existence has been destroyed by pollution.
就应该有人惩治一下街头的赖子，不让他们整日横行霸道！
Jiù yīnggāi yǒurén chéngzhì yíxià jiētóu de làizi，bú ràng tāmen zhěngrì héngxíng bàdào！
Someone should punish the rascals and block them from riding roughshod.
你不用死乞白赖地求他，没有他我们照样能成功。
Nǐ búyòng sǐqǐbáilài de qiú tā，méiyǒu tā wǒmen zhàoyàng néng chénggōng。
You don\'t need to pester him. We can succeed without him.
我又不会赖账，你何必苦苦索逼？
Wǒ yòu búhuì làizhàng，nǐ hébì kǔkǔ suǒbī？
I won\'t repudiate my debts, why are you forcing me to pay so strongly?
过去我都依赖进口的洋油。
Guòqù wǒ dōu yīlài jìnkǒu de yángyóu。
In the past, we relied on imported oil.
现在谁都仰赖不了，你还是靠自己吧。
Xiànzài shuí dōu yǎnglài bùliǎo，nǐ háishi kào zìjǐ ba。
You can rely on nobody now, so count on yourself.
这家公司生产的推进器质量值得信赖。
Zhèjiā gōngsī shēngchǎn de tuījìnqì zhìliàng zhídé xìnlài。
The propellers produced by this company are quality-guaranteed.

Nǐ zìjǐ zuò cuòle shì búyào lài biérén.

完全信赖某人
a crafty rascal
狡诈的无赖

她仍然依赖父母生活。

她演得不赖。

这条小径延伸到比这条路更远一点的地方。

niánlíng
age

They are close in age but differ greatly in rank, so they naturally have many differences.

随着年龄的增加，爷爷的老视越来越严重了。

We have had an enthusiastic response from both our young and old audiences.
Wǒmen shōudào le láizì gègè niánlíng jiēcéng guānzhòng de jījí rèqíng de huíyìng。
我们收到了来自各个年龄阶层观众的积极热情的回应。
She is rated among the top 10 national players in her age group.
Tā bèi rènwéi shì zài tā de niánlíngzǔ quánguó páimíng qián shí de xuǎnshǒu。
她被认为是在她的年龄组全国排名前十的选手。
Though past retirement age he is still active in his profession.
Jǐnguǎn yǐjīng guòle tuìxiū niánlíng，tā hái huóyuèzài zìjǐ de gōngzuò gǎngwèi shàng。
尽管已经过了退休年龄，他还活跃在自己的工作岗位上。
The unhappy memories of her childhood receded as she grew older.
Suízhe niánlíng zēngzhǎng，tā háitíshídài de búxìng jìyì xiāotuì le。
随着年龄增长，她孩提时代的不幸记忆消褪了。
We live in a litigious age.
Wǒmen zhèng chǔzài zhēngqiánghàoshèng de niánlíng。
我们正处在争强好胜的年龄。
She was now of school age.
Tā xiànzài dàole shàngxué de niánlíng。
她现在到了上学的年龄。
She was wonderfully alive for her age.
Duìyú tā de niánlíng éryán，tā shízài shì tài huópo le。
对于她的年龄而言，她实在是太活泼了。
Age and experience mellowed him over the years.
Zhèxiē nián lái，niánlíng hé jīngyàn shǐ tā gèngjiā chéngshú。
这些年来，年龄和经验使他更加成熟。
Such poise is singular in one so young.
Duìyú zhème xiǎo de niánlíng láishuō rúcǐ de zhèndìnggǎn shì fēifán de。
对于这么小的年龄来说如此的镇定感是非凡的。
The level of activity declines with age.
Huódòng shuǐpíng suí niánlíng zēngzhǎng ér xiàhuá。
活动水平随年龄增长而下滑。
Height is a function of age.
Shēngāo shì yóu niánlíng juédìng de。
身高是由年龄决定的。
With age，he mellowed.
Suízhe niánlíng zēngzhǎng，tā gèng chéngshú le。
随着年龄增长，他更成熟了。
You must consider her age.
Nǐ bìxū kǎolǜ dào tā de niánlíng。
你必须考虑到她的年龄。
I was carded when I tried to buy a beer!
Zài wǒ shìtú mǎi píjiǔ zhīshí，mài jiǔ de rén wèn wǒ shìfǒu dádàole hējiǔ niánlíng。
在我试图买啤酒之时，卖酒的人问我是否达到了喝酒年龄。
She changed completely as she grew older.
Suízhe niánlíng de zēngzhǎng，tā wánquán gǎibiàn le。
随着年龄的增长，她完全改变了。
The frequency of his seizures increased as he grew older.
Suízhe niánlíng yuèláiyuè dà，tā de fābìng cìshù yě yuèláiyuè duō le。
随着年龄越来越大，他的发病次数也越来越多了。
Age hasn\'t slowed him down at all.
Niánlíng bìng méiyǒu ràng tā fàngmàn jiǎobù。
年龄并没有让他放慢脚步。
The actress won\'t reveal how old she is.
Zhè wèi nǚyǎnyuán búhuì tòulù tā de niánlíng。
这位女演员不会透露她的年龄。
His responses have slowed with age.
Tā de fǎnyìng suízhe niánlíng de zēngjiā ér biàn de chíhuǎn le。
他的反应随着年龄的增加而变得迟缓了。
Bishoprics were received as appanages for the younger sons of great families.
Zhǔjiào zhíwèi bèi zuòwéi yì zhǒng fēnglù ér shòuyǔle dàjiāzú niánlíng jiàoxiǎo de érzimen。
主教职位被作为一种封禄而授予了大家族年龄较小的儿子们。
A claim to an estate may be defeasible so long as the claimant is under 21 and unmarried.
Zhǐyào qǐngqiúrén niánlíng zài 21 suì yǐxià、wèihūn，tā/tā duì búdòngchǎn de qǐngqiú jiù kěnéng bèi jùjué。
只要请求人年龄在21岁以下、未婚，他/她对不动产的请求就可能被拒绝。
In the circumstances it was tactless to ask her age.
Zài zhè zhǒng tèshū qíngkuàng xià wèn tā de niánlíng shì hěn bù míngzhì de。
在这种特殊情况下问她的年龄是很不明智的。
Adolescence is an awkward in-between age.
Qīngchūnqī shì yí duàn nányǐ chǔlǐ de guòdù niánlíng。
青春期是一段难以处理的过渡年龄。
She acts very maturely for her age.
Jiù tā de niánlíng éryán，tā de jǔzhǐ shì hěn chéngshú de。
就她的年龄而言，她的举止是很成熟的。
He did respectably well for his age.
Kǎolǜ dào tā de niánlíng，tā zuò de xiāngdāng búcuò。
考虑到他的年龄，他做得相当不错。
Every mother\'s son who could walk was there.
Gè gè niánlíngduàn de nánrén dōu zài nàr。
各个年龄段的男人都在那儿。
He is chronologically older.
Ànzhào niándài suàn，tā niánlíng gèng dà。
按照年代算，他年龄更大。
Boys gravitate towards girls at that age.
Nánhái zài nàgè niánlíngduàn dōuhuì shòudào nǚhái de xīyǐn。
男孩在那个年龄段都会受到女孩的吸引。
The cross-classification of cases was done by age and sex.
Ànlì kěyǐ àn niánlíng hé xìngbié jìnxíng jiāochā fēnlèi。
案例可以按年龄和性别进行交叉分类。
His chronological age was 71 years.
Tā de shízú niánlíng shì 71 suì。
他的实足年龄是71岁。
The modal age at which American novelists reach their peak is 30.

美国小说家达到创作高峰期的平均年龄是30。
Instructions altered to suit the children\'s different ages.
Wèile shìyìng bùtóng niánlíng jiēduàn de háizi，jiàoyùzhìdù bèi tiáozhěng le。

Fifty years ago, the bowl game was a different ball game.
五十年前，保龄球运动跟现在完全不同。

别看他年龄不大，懂的可多了。
Bié kàn tā niánlíng búdà，dǒng de kě duō le。
Although he is young, he knows quite a lot.

Zhège gōngchǎng yǐjing yǒu bāshínián de chǎnglíng le。
This factory has a history of 80 years.
他是已经有了30年厂龄的老职工了。

As a senior worker, he has worked in this factory for 30 years.
他这么小的年龄就处变不惊，长大后一定会有所作为。

The age of a ship is restricted in order to guarantee sailing safety.
每到周末，这里总会有不少父母来为自己的大龄儿女挑对象。
Měi dào zhōumò，zhèlǐ zǒng huì yǒu bùshǎo fùmǔ lái wèi zìjǐ de dàlíng érnǚ tiāo duì xiàng。
On every weekend, many parents come here to select boyfriends/girlfriends for their relatively old daughters/sons.
这些二手房的房龄不同，价格也不等。
Zhèxiē èrshǒufáng de fánglíng bùtóng，jiàgé yě bùděng。
The prices of these second-hand houses vary depending how many years they have been used.
孩子们到了入学的年龄就要用官名了。
Háizǐmen dàole rùxué de niánlíng jiùyào yòng guānmíng le。
这个护兵年龄在我之下，年轻着呢。
Zhège hùbīng niánlíng zài wǒ zhīxià，niánqīng zhe ne。
The guard is still quite young, he is younger than me.
随着年龄的增长，她脸上出现了黄褐斑。
Suí zhe niánlíng de zēngzhǎng，tā liǎnshàng chūxiàn le huánghèbān。
With the increase of age, chloasma began to appear on her face.
和同龄人相比，他的生活实在是灰不溜丢。
Hé tónglíngrén xiāngbǐ，tā de shēnghuó shízai shì huībùliūdiū。
Compared with his peers, his life was really gloomy.
他已经及龄，可以结婚了。
Tā yǐjing jílíng，kěyǐ jiéhūn le。
He has reached the required age to get married.
他们两个虽然年龄相差不大，但是级差却很大，自然有许多不同。
Tāmen liǎnggè suīrán niánlíng xiāngchà búdà，dànshì jíchā què hěndà，zìrán yǒu xǔduō bùtóng。
They are close in age but differ greatly in rank, so they naturally have many differences.
这位老警察的警龄已有30年。
Zhèwèi lǎojǐngchá de jǐnglíng yǐ yǒu sānshí nián。
This old policeman has worked as a policeman for 30 years.
蒲松龄号柳泉居士，生前一直默默无闻。
Pú Sōnglíng hào Liǔquánjūshì，shēngqián yìzhí mòmòwúwén。
Pu Songling, little known while alive, was also called Liuquan Jushi.
“人生如戏，聚散无常”，随着年龄的增长，他对这话的感触越来越深。
“Rénshēng rúxì，jùsǎn wúcháng”，suízhe niánlíng de zēngzhǎng，tā duì zhèhuà de gǎnchù yuèláiyuèshēn。
&quot;Life is like a play and everything is uncertain.&quot; With the increase of age, he is more and more touched by this sentence.
我们的社会老龄人数越来越多，政府应该采取措施来保障老年人的生活。
Wǒmen de shèhuì lǎolíng rénshù yuèláiyuè duō，zhèngfǔ yīnggāi cǎiqǔ cuòshī lái bǎozhàng lǎoniánrén de shēnghuó。
There are more and more old people in society; the government should take measures to secure their lives.
这个老太太在老龄大学里学京剧，在今年的票友大赛中还获了大奖。
Zhège lǎotàitài zài lǎolíng dàxué lǐ xué jīngjù，zài jīnnián de piàoyǒu dàsài zhōng hái huò le dàjiǎng。
The old lady learned Beijing opera at a university for senior people, and won a prize in an amateur performance contest this year.
虽然他年龄不大，但是脸上长了很多老人斑。
Suīrán tā niánlíng búdà，dànshì liǎnshàng zhǎng le hěnduō lǎorénbān。
Though he was not very old, he had got a lot of age spots on his face.
随着年龄的增加，爷爷的老视越来越严重了。
Suí zhe niánlíng de zēngjiā，yéye de lǎoshì yuèláiyuè yánzhòng le。
With advancing age, my grandpa gets more and more serious presbyopia.
这位老先生已经80岁高龄了，还是精神矍铄。
Zhèwèi lǎoxiānshēng yǐjing bāshísuì gāolíng le，háishi jīngshénjuéshuò。
This old gentleman is already 80 years old, but he is still hale and healthy.
这几年受到家事所累，他比同龄人老相得多。
Zhè jǐnián shòudào jiāshì suǒlèi，tā bǐ tónglíngrén lǎo xiàng de duō。
Having been troubled by family affairs in recent years, he looks much older than his peers.
我们是两姨亲，又是同龄人，所以彼此很熟悉。
Wǒmen shì liǎngyíqīn，yòushì tónglíngrén，suǒyǐ bǐcǐ hěnshúxī。
We are cousins and of the same age, so we are quite familiar with each other.
同年龄段的伙伴们都还在校读书时，小李就已经工作了。
Tóng niánlíngduàn de huǒbànmen dōu hái zàixiào dúshū shí，Xiǎo Lǐ jiù yǐjing gōngzuò le。
While other people at his age are still studying, Xiao Li has already started work.
听说这棵老树已经有千岁的树龄了。
Tīngshuō zhè kē lǎoshù yǐjing yǒu qiānsuì de shùlíng le。
It\'s said that the old tree is over a thousand years old.
十几岁正是女孩儿最清纯的年龄。
Shí jǐ suì zhèngshì nǚháir zuì qīngchún de niánlíng。
The teenage girls are very pretty and innocent.
他是这个球队里球龄最大的队员。
Tā shì zhège qiúduì lǐ qiúlíng zuìdàde duìyuán。
He has the player in his team who has played ball the longest.
这棵老树已经有500年的树龄了。
Zhè kē lǎoshù yǐjing yǒu wǔbǎinián de shùlíng le。
This old tree is already 500 years old.
虽然不是同龄人，但是他们却有很多共同语言。
Suīrán búshì tónglíngrén，dànshì tāmen què yǒu hěnduō gòngtóng yǔyán。
Despite their age gap, they have a lot to talk about.
这本精美的图册适合学龄前儿童阅读。
Zhèběn jīngměi de túcè shì hé xuélíngqián értóng yuèdú。
This delicate picture book is suitable for preschoolers to read.
如今我已经有10年的团龄了。
Rújīn wǒ yǐjing yǒu shínián de tuánlíng le。
I\'ve been a Communist Youth League member for 10 years.
奶奶今年90遐龄了，依然精神矍铄。
Nǎinai jīnnián jiǔshí xiálíng le，yīrán jīngshén juéshuò。
My grandmother is in her 90s, but she is still energetic.
她父亲90高龄，真是珍摄有方啊。
Tā fùqīn jiǔshí gāolíng，zhēnshì zhēnshè yǒufāng a。
Her father is 90 years old, and he has really taken good care of himself.
别看他年纪小，智龄却很高。
Biékàn tā niánjì xiǎo，zhìlíng què hěngāo。
Though he is quite young, he has a high brain age.
他年龄尚小，羽毛未丰，看起来就是一副很稚气的样子。
Tā niánlíng shàngxiǎo，yǔmáo wèifēng，kànqǐlái jiùshì yífù hěn zhìqì de yàngzi。
He is still quite young and not mature enough. Judging from his appearance, people think he is quite childish.
孩子们到了入学的年龄就要用学名了。
Háizǐmen dàole rùxué de niánlíng jiùyào yòng xuémíng le。
Children should be called by their official name when they reach school age.

Qǐng tiánxiě nǐde niánlíng、xìngbié jí zhèngzhì pàibié。
Please complete all parts of the form including age, gender and political party.
他们两个人年龄相仿。
Tāmen liǎnggèrén niánlíngxiāngfǎng。
They are both about the same age.
高龄孕妇
gāolíngyùnfù
women who are pregnant later in life
保龄球是室内运动。
Bǎolíngqiú shì shìnèi yùndòng.

对于这么小的年龄来说如此的镇定感是非凡的。
The level of activity declines with age.
Huódòng shuǐpíng suí niánlíng zēngzhǎng ér xiàhuá。
活动水平随年龄增长而下滑。
Height is a function of age.
Shēngāo shì yóu niánlíng juédìng de。
身高是由年龄决定的。
With age，he mellowed.
Suízhe niánlíng zēngzhǎng，tā gèng chéngshú le。
随着年龄增长，他更成熟了。
You must consider her age.
Nǐ bìxū kǎolǜ dào tā de niánlíng。
你必须考虑到她的年龄。
I was carded when I tried to buy a beer!
Zài wǒ shìtú mǎi píjiǔ zhīshí，mài jiǔ de rén wèn wǒ shìfǒu dádàole hējiǔ niánlíng。
在我试图买啤酒之时，卖酒的人问我是否达到了喝酒年龄。
He is young for his age.
Jiù niánlíng éryán tā hái hěn niánqīng。
就年龄而言他还很年轻。
The break in the eighth frame cost him the match.
Dì-bā jú de shīlì lìng tā diūdiàole bǎolíngqiú bǐsài。
第八局的失利令他丢掉了保龄球比赛。
She changed completely as she grew older.
Suízhe niánlíng de zēngzhǎng，tā wánquán gǎibiàn le。
随着年龄的增长，她完全改变了。
The frequency of his seizures increased as he grew older.
Suízhe niánlíng yuèláiyuè dà，tā de fābìng cìshù yě yuèláiyuè duō le。
随着年龄越来越大，他的发病次数也越来越多了。
Age hasn\'t slowed him down at all.
Niánlíng bìng méiyǒu ràng tā fàngmàn jiǎobù。
年龄并没有让他放慢脚步。
The actress won\'t reveal how old she is.
Zhè wèi nǚyǎnyuán búhuì tòulù tā de niánlíng。
这位女演员不会透露她的年龄。
His responses have slowed with age.
Tā de fǎnyìng suízhe niánlíng de zēngjiā ér biàn de chíhuǎn le。
他的反应随着年龄的增加而变得迟缓了。
During the war they turned the bowling alleys into rifle ranges.
Zhànzhēngqījiān，tāmen bǎ bǎolíngqiú chǎng biànchéng bùqiāng shèjīchǎng。
战争期间，他们把保龄球场变成步枪射击场。
Bishoprics were received as appanages for the younger sons of great families.
Zhǔjiào zhíwèi bèi zuòwéi yì zhǒng fēnglù ér shòuyǔle dàjiāzú niánlíng jiàoxiǎo de érzimen。
主教职位被作为一种封禄而授予了大家族年龄较小的儿子们。
A claim to an estate may be defeasible so long as the claimant is under 21 and unmarried.
Zhǐyào qǐngqiúrén niánlíng zài 21 suì yǐxià、wèihūn，tā/tā duì búdòngchǎn de qǐngqiú jiù kěnéng bèi jùjué。
只要请求人年龄在21岁以下、未婚，他/她对不动产的请求就可能被拒绝。
In the circumstances it was tactless to ask her age.
Zài zhè zhǒng tèshū qíngkuàng xià wèn tā de niánlíng shì hěn bù míngzhì de。
在这种特殊情况下问她的年龄是很不明智的。
Adolescence is an awkward in-between age.
Qīngchūnqī shì yí duàn nányǐ chǔlǐ de guòdù niánlíng。
青春期是一段难以处理的过渡年龄。
Elderly parents often depend on their adult children.
Niánlíng dà de fùmǔ jīngcháng yīkào tāmen de chéngniánzǐnǚ。
年龄大的父母经常依靠他们的成年子女。
She acts very maturely for her age.
Jiù tā de niánlíng éryán，tā de jǔzhǐ shì hěn chéngshú de。
就她的年龄而言，她的举止是很成熟的。
He did respectably well for his age.
Kǎolǜ dào tā de niánlíng，tā zuò de xiāngdāng búcuò。
考虑到他的年龄，他做得相当不错。
Every mother\'s son who could walk was there.
Gè gè niánlíngduàn de nánrén dōu zài nàr。
各个年龄段的男人都在那儿。
He is chronologically older.
Ànzhào niándài suàn，tā niánlíng gèng dà。
按照年代算，他年龄更大。
Boys gravitate towards girls at that age.
Nánhái zài nàgè niánlíngduàn dōuhuì shòudào nǚhái de xīyǐn。
男孩在那个年龄段都会受到女孩的吸引。
The cross-classification of cases was done by age and sex.
Ànlì kěyǐ àn niánlíng hé xìngbié jìnxíng jiāochā fēnlèi。
案例可以按年龄和性别进行交叉分类。
His chronological age was 71 years.
Tā de shízú niánlíng shì 71 suì。
他的实足年龄是71岁。
The modal age at which American novelists reach their peak is 30.
Měiguó xiǎoshuōjiā dádào chuàngzuò gāofēngqī de píngjūn niánlíng shì sānshí。
美国小说家达到创作高峰期的平均年龄是30。
Instructions altered to suit the children\'s different ages.
Wèile shìyìng bùtóng niánlíng jiēduàn de háizi，jiàoyùzhìdù bèi tiáozhěng le。
为了适应不同年龄阶段的孩子，教育制度被调整了。
我们的社会老龄人数越来越多，政府应该采取措施来保障老年人的生活。

There are more and more old people in society; the government should take measures to secure their lives.

他年龄并不老，可是已经歇顶了。

He is not old but is already balding.

This old tree is already 500 years old.

When talking about the elderly in this sense, we are referring to people in an advanced age group of well over eighty.

He will take on any amount of trouble to help you.

Our policy is to speak softly but carry a big stick.

He weighed up her words and smiled thoughtfully.
Tā quánhéngle yíxià tā de yáncí，ruòyǒusuǒsī de xiào le。
他权衡了一下她的言辞，若有所思地笑了。
Their language inclines us to believe them.

The speaker charged up the crowd with his inflammatory remarks.

xiūcí

修辞手段，修辞格
A figure is also called a rhetoric.
Bǐyù yǒushí yě chēngwéi xiūcí。
比喻有时也称为修辞。
Counterfeit rhetoric that flourishes when passions are synthetic.
Dāng jīqíng shì rénzào de shíhou，jiǎmào de xiūcí jiù huì fànlàn。
当激情是人造的时候，假冒的修辞就会泛滥。
A simile has at least two layers of meaning.
Míngyù xiūcí zhìshǎo yǒu liǎngcéng hányì。
明喻修辞至少有两层含义。
To say &quot;He spent the evening reading Shakespeare&quot; is metonymic because it substitutes the author himself for the author\'s works.
Shuō“Tā zhěngyè zài dú Shāshìbǐyà”shì yì zhǒng zhuǎnyù xiūcí fāngfǎ，yīnwèi cǐ chù zuòzhě běnrén dàitìle tā de zuòpǐn。
说“他整夜在读莎士比亚”是一种转喻修辞方法，因为此处作者本人代替了他的作品。
Accepted two or three verbal and rhetorical changes I suggested.

Méiyǒu yìyì biànhuà de xiūcí zhī guò。

评论家说：他的新诗，文辞雅致哀婉。

辞藻完美的散文

What the boss said at the meeting is a cliche.
《语法修辞讲话》
His words echoed john f. Kennedy.
Tā de cuòcí mófǎngle Kěnnídí de yǎnjiǎng。
他的措辞模仿了肯尼迪的演讲。
The speaker charged up the crowd with his inflammatory remarks.
Yǎnjiǎngzhě shǐyòng qí jíjù shāndòngxìng de yáncí lái gǔdòng rénmen。
演讲者使用其极具煽动性的言辞来鼓动人们。
我怕耽误他的时间，谈了一会儿就告辞了。
Wǒ pà dānwù tā de shíjiān，tán le yíhuìr jiù gàocí le。
I took leave after a brief talk so as not to take up too much of his time.
告辞
gàocí
take leave (of one\'s host)
小弟告辞了，兄台请留步，不必相送。
Xiǎodì gàocí le，xiōngtái qǐng liúbù，búbì xiāngsòng。
I have to go now, don\'t bother to see me out.
他们寒暄了须臾，也没说什么，就告辞了。
Tāmen hánxuān le xūyú，yě méi shuō shénme，jiù gàocí le。
They exchanged greetings for a while and parted with each other without saying anything more.
告辞
gàocí
take one\'s leave
晚饭后他起身告辞。
Wǎnfànhòu tā qǐshēngàocí。
After the meal, he stood up and took his leave.
就此告辞
告辞
向朋友告辞
起身告辞
送礼遭到拒绝，他只得讪讪地告辞了。
He took his leave.
Tā gàocí ér qù。
他告辞而去。
notice to quit
[BRIT] 请辞报告
Do you see truth in the reports of her resignation?
你认为她的辞职报告里有真话吗？
He had thundered against the false reports.
Tā jíyán-lìcí de chìzé zhèxiē jiǎ bàogào。
他疾言厉辞地斥责这些假报告。
The report and its subsequent controversy caused the mayor to resign.
这份报告和由此产生的争论导致了市长的辞职。
他们逼迫他辞职。
Tāmen bīpò tā cízhí。
They forced him to resign.
称病辞职
chēngbìng cízhí 
resign on grounds of ill health
接受辞职
jiēshòu cízhí 
accept a resignation
据悉，他将于明天辞职。
Jùxī，tā jiāngyú míngtiān cízhí。
He is reportedly going to resign tomorrow.
他们都奇怪你为什么要辞职。
Tāmen dōu qíguài nǐ wèishénme yào cízhí。
They feel surprised at your resignation.
内阁全体辞职。
Nèigé quántǐ cízhí。
The cabinet resigned en bloc.
引咎辞职
yǐn jiù cízhí 
take the blame and resign
他向领导提出了辞职申请，这无异在走钢丝。
Tā xiàng lǐngdǎo tíchū le cízhí shēnqǐng，zhè wúyì zài zǒu gāngsī。
He was taking a risk when he handed in his resignation.
由于身体原因，他向上级稟呈了辞职信。
Yóuyú shēntǐ yuányīn，tā xiàng shàngjí bǐngchéng le cízhíxìn。
Due to health reasons, he submitted his letter of resignation to his superior.
他不想再吃粉笔灰了，年后辞职离开了学校。
Tā bùxiǎng zài chī fěnbǐhuī le，niánhòu cízhí líkāi le xuéxiào。
He didn\'t want to eat chalk-powder any more, so he quit and left the school in the new year .
他在老板门前来回蹀躞，还是没有勇气提出辞职。
Tā zài lǎobǎn ménqián láihuí diéxiè，háishì méiyǒu yǒngqì tíchū cízhí。
He paced up and down in front of his boss\'s door, still not brave enough to resign.
君主昏庸，开国元勋们纷纷辞职归田。
Jūnzhǔ hūnyōng，kāiguó yuánxūnmen fēnfēn cízhí guītián。
The founding heroes resigned from office and returned home one after another because of the fatuous and self-indulgent ruler.
他的辖区发生了刑讯迫供的事，他不得不引咎辞职。
Tā de xiáqū fāshēng le xíngxùn pògòng de shì，tā bùdébùyǐnjiù cízhí。
He had to acknowledge his mistake and resign because the use of torture to extort a confession happened within the area he administers.
设使你当初不辞职，现在肯定是处长了。
Shèshǐ nǐ dāngchū bùcízhí，xiànzài kěndìng shì chùcháng le。
If you hadn\'t resigned then, you would certainly have become a section chief by now!
因为卷入贿赂案，他愤而引咎辞职。
Yīnwéi juǎnrù huìlùàn，tā fènér yǐnjiù cízhí。
Because he was involved in the bribery, he acknowledged his mistake and resigned.
辞职的员工离开前要把工作交待给其他人。
Cízhí de yuángōng líkāi qián yào bǎ gōngzuò jiāodài gěi qítā rén。
Workers who want to resign have to transfer their tasks to others before they leave.
虽然领导百般挽留，她毅然决然地辞职下海。
Suīrán lǐngdǎo bǎibān wǎnliú，tā yìrán juérán de cízhí xiàhǎi。
Although her leader used every method to urge her to stay, she is determined to resign and go into business.
他突然辞职，大家都很诧异。
Tā tūrán cízhí，dàjiā dōu hěnchàyì。
When he suddenly resigned everybody was very surprised.
他当真辞职了？
Tā dàngzhēn cízhí le？
Did he really resign?

yǐnjiùcízhí
take the blame and resign
她决意要辞职。

She was determined to resign.

The boss felt regret, even distress, about the spate of resignations.
我左一句右一句地劝他别辞职。
Wǒ zuǒyíjù yòuyíjù de quàn tā bié cízhí。
I tried again and again to persuade him not to give up his job.
我要辞职。
Wǒ yào cízhí 。
I want to resign.

He thought he was not qualified to head the bureau and resigned from the post.

不辞劳苦
bùcíláokǔ
spare no pains
文辞滂沛
wéncí pānɡpèi
powerful writing
他们都奇怪你为什么要辞职。
Tāmen dōu qíguài nǐ wèishénme yào cízhí。
They feel surprised at your resignation.
岂能不辞而别？
Qǐ néngbùcíérbié?
How could you leave without saying good-bye?
内阁全体辞职。
Nèigé quántǐ cízhí。
The cabinet resigned en bloc.
不擅辞令
búshàn cílìng
lack facility in polite or tactful speech
舍生取义，虽死何辞？
Shěshēngqǔyì，suī sǐ hé cí?
Nothing shall prevent me from dying for righteousness.
实际行动胜过空洞的言辞。
Shíjì xíngdòng shèngguò kōngdòng de yáncí。
Action speaks louder than words.
辞旧岁，迎新年
cí jiùsuì, yíng xīnnián
ring out the Old Year and ring in the New
文辞优美
wéncí yōuměi 
exquisite diction; elegant language
不辞辛劳
bùcí xīnláo
spare no pains
他欣喜之情，形于辞色。
Tā xīnxǐ zhī qíng，xíngyúcísè。
There was joy in his words and on his face.
文辞秀拔
wéncí xiùbá
elegant and forceful language
文辞秀逸
wéncí xiùyì
elegant, free-flowing language
虚饰的文辞
xūshì de wéncí
flashy, empty words
言辞不逊
yácí bú xùn
make impertinent remarks; speak insolently
他一气之下不辞而别。
Tā yíqì zhī xià bùcíérbié。
Greatly angered, he left without saying good-bye.
引咎辞职
yǐn jiù cízhí 
take the blame and resign
请来宾向大会致辞
qǐngláibīn xiàng dàhuì zhìcí 
call upon a guest to address the conference
新年致辞
xīnnián zhìcí 
New Year message
致祝酒辞
zhì zhùjiǔcí 
propose a toast
他向领导提出了辞职申请，这无异在走钢丝。
Tā xiàng lǐngdǎo tíchū le cízhí shēnqǐng，zhè wúyì zài zǒu gāngsī。
He was taking a risk when he handed in his resignation.
修辞
xiūcí
rhetoric
告辞
gàocí
take leave (of one\'s host)
不辞辛苦
bù cí xīnkǔ
spare no effort; take pains; take the trouble to; go to the trouble of doing sth.
善为说辞
shànwéishuōcí
put in a good word for sb.
“词典”同“辞典”。
“Cídiǎn”tóng“cídiǎn”。
“词典” is the same as“辞典”.
辞藻
cízǎo
flowery language; rhetoric; ornate diction
爷爷辞世，全家人深感哀恸。
Yéye císhì，quánjiārén shēngǎn āitòng。
The family was in mourning over the death of their grandfather.
评论家说：他的新诗，文辞雅致哀婉。
Pínglùnjiā shuō：tā de xīnshī，wéncí yǎzhì āiwǎn。
Critics say there is something elegant, and melancholy in his new poems.
拜辞过家乡父老以后，他就上路了。
Bàicí guò jiāxiāngfùlǎo yǐhòu，tā jiù shànglù le。
After bidding farewell to those in his village, he went on his way.
这礼物太贵重了，我只能拜辞。
Zhè lǐwù tài guìzhòng le，wǒ zhǐnéng bàicí。
I have to refuse your present because it is too expensive.
面对大家的赞扬，她卑辞连连。
Miànduì dàjiā de zànyáng，tā bēicí liánlián。
She is very modest in face of all that praise.
语文课上老师教大家如何贬辞褒用。
Yǔwénkè shàng lǎoshī jiāo dàjiā rúhé biǎncí bāoyòng。
In Chinese class, the teacher shows the students how to use a derogatory term to convey a positive meaning.
由于身体原因，他向上级稟呈了辞职信。
Yóuyú shēntǐ yuányīn，tā xiàng shàngjí bǐngchéng le cízhíxìn。
Due to health reasons, he submitted his letter of resignation to his superior.
他不会不辞而别的，我们还是耐心等待吧。
Tā búhuì bùcí ér bié de，wǒmen háishì nàixīn děngdài ba。
He will not leave without saying goodbye, we’d better wait patiently.
为了你我付出再多也在所不辞。
Wèile nǐ wǒ fùchū zài duō yě zàisuǒ bùcí。
He will take on any amount of trouble to help you.
她已经辞掉了工作，一心在家操理家务。
Tā yǐjing cídiào le gōngzuò，yìxīn zài jiā cāolǐ jiāwù。
She quit her job, and now wholeheartedly does housework at home.
老人于昨晚与世长辞。
Lǎorén yú zuówǎn yǔshì chángcí。
The elderly man passed away last night.
《木兰辞》是中国古代著名的长诗。
《Mùláncí》 shì Zhōngguó gǔdài zhùmíng de chángshī。
Mu Lan Ci is a famous ancient Chinese long poem.
他不想再吃粉笔灰了，年后辞职离开了学校。
Tā bùxiǎng zài chī fěnbǐhuī le，niánhòu cízhí líkāi le xuéxiào。
He didn\'t want to eat chalk-powder any more, so he quit and left the school in the new year .
咱们之间说话就没有必要用外交辞令了吧。
Zánmen zhījiān shuōhuà jiù méiyǒu bìyào yòng wàijiāo cílìng le ba。
There is no need to use diplomatic language while we are talking.
辞章学是一门很枯燥的学问。
Cízhāngxué shì yìmén hěnkūzào de xuéwèn。
The study of the art of writing is a very boring subject.
他毕生从事中华辞赋的研究和推广。
Tā bìshēng cóngshì zhōng huá cífù de yánjiū hé tuīguǎng。
He has devoted himself to the research and promotion of the Chinese style of metrical composition.
这个词在此处的辞格应为宾格。
Zhègecí zài cǐchù de cígé yīngwéi bīngé。
This word in this position is in the objective case.
您应该去查辞海。
Nín yīnggāi qù chá cíhǎi。
You should look it up in the Cihai.
他嫌工资太低，已经辞活不干了。
Tā xián gōngzī tài dī，yǐjing cíhuó búgàn le。
He quit the job because the salary was so low.
辞年迎岁的联欢会马上就要开始了。
Cínián yíngsuì de liánhuānhuì mǎshàng jiùyào kāishǐ le。
The celebration for lunar New Year\'s Eve will begin in any minute.
我辞聘贵公司是因为我觉得自己不能胜任这份工作。
Wǒ cípìn guì gōngsī shì yīnwèi wǒ juédé zìjǐ bùnéng shèngrèn zhèfèn gōngzuò。
I turned down your job offer because I don\'t think that I am qualified for it.
时间已经不早了，他起身辞去。
Shíjiān yǐjing bùzǎo le，tā qǐshēn cíqù。
It was already late, so he stood up and took his leave.
由于身体原因，我决定辞去厂长职务。
Yóuyú shēntǐ yuányīn，wǒ juédìng cíqù chǎngzhǎng zhíwù。
Due to health problems, I decided to resign my post as factory director.
我辞却了他们的宴请。
Wǒ cíquè le tāmen de yànqǐng。
I declined their dinner invitation.
对他的辞讼请求，我们会认真考虑的。
Duì tā de císòng qǐngqiú，wǒmen huì rènzhēn kǎolǜ de。
We will seriously consider his resignation request.
因为已经答应了另外一个演出，他只能辞演这一场。
Yīnwéi yǐjing dāying le lìngwài yígè yǎnchū，tā zhǐnéng cíyǎn zhèyìchǎng。
He has no choice but to refuse this performance because he has promised to join another performance.
这位教授是辞源学的专家。
Zhèwèi jiàoshòu shì cíyuánxué de zhuānjiā。
This professor is a specialist in the study of the origin of phraseology.
在乡村，辞灶的仪式是很重要的。
Zài xiāngcūn，cízào de yíshì shì hěnzhòngyào de。
The ceremony of sending out the kitchen god is very important in the village.
他的受奖答辞非常恳切感人。
Tā de shòujiǎng dácí fēicháng kěnqiè gǎnrén。
His prize acceptance speech was sincere and moving.
他在网络聊天室里大放阙辞。
Tā zài wǎngluò liáotiānshì lǐ dàfàng quēcí。
He made absurd statements in the internet chat room.
为了完成领导交给的任务，上刀山，下火海，也在所不辞。
Wèile wánchéng lǐngdǎo jiāogěi de rènwù，shàng dāoshān，xià huǒhǎi，yě zài suǒ bùcí。
To finish the task ordered by the leader, I will not hesitate to undergo manifold ordeals.
追悼会上，他的生前好友致了悼辞。
Zhuīdàohuì shàng，tā de shēngqián hǎoyǒu zhì le dàocí。
His former friend delivered the eulogy on his funeral.
他在老板门前来回蹀躞，还是没有勇气提出辞职。
Tā zài lǎobǎn ménqián láihuí diéxiè，háishì méiyǒu yǒngqì tíchū cízhí。
He paced up and down in front of his boss\'s door, still not brave enough to resign.
这句话运用了对仗的修辞方法。
Zhèjùhuà yùnyòng le duìzhàng de xiūcí fāngfǎ。
The passage employs a figure of speech called parallelism.
欠债还钱，你就别说遁辞了！
Qiànzhài háiqián，nǐ jiù bié shuō dùncí le！
If you owe money to others, you have to pay. Don\'t quibble!
老总在大会上讲的都是一些浮辞滥调。
Lǎozǒng zài dàhuì shàng jiǎng de dōushì yìxiē fúcí làndiào。
What the boss said at the meeting is a cliche.
在此辞旧迎新的时候，我们恭祝新老顾客身体健康，财源广进。
Zài cǐ cíjiù yíngxīn de shíhou，wǒmen gōngzhù xīnlǎo gùkè shēntǐjiànkāng，cáiyuán guǎngjìn。
During this time of ringing out the old year and ringing in the new, we wish both our new customers and old customers good health and abundant wealth.
一家公司想邀请他去当顾问，但是他固辞不受。
Yì jiā gōngsī xiǎng yāoqǐng tā qù dāng gùwèn，dànshì tā gùcí búshòu。
A company wanted to hire him as their consultant, but he refused firmly.
君主昏庸，开国元勋们纷纷辞职归田。
Jūnzhǔ hūnyōng，kāiguó yuánxūnmen fēnfēn cízhí guītián。
The founding heroes resigned from office and returned home one after another because of the fatuous and self-indulgent ruler.
你不要含糊其辞，我要的是明确的答复。
Nǐ búyào hánhú qící，wǒ yào de shì míngquè de dáfù。
Don\'t be ambiguous, I need a explicit reply.
主婚人向这对新婚夫妇致新婚贺辞。
Zhǔhūnrén xiàng zhè duì xīnhūn fūfù zhì xīnhūn hècí。
The master of the wedding ceremony delivers a speech of congratulation to the newlyweds.
我买了一个英汉互译的电子辞典。
Wǒ mǎi le yígè yīnghàn hùyì de diànzǐ cídiǎn。
I bought an English-Chinese, and Chinese-English electronic dictionary.
参加急难救助，是每个国民义不容辞的责任。
Cānjiā jínàn jiùzhù，shì měigè guómín yìbùróngcí de zérèn。
It is a duty of every citizen to give others in trouble a helping hand.
重新勘定的辞典共校正出字词错误72处。
Chóngxīn kāndìng de cídiǎn gòng jiàozhèng chū zìcí cuòwù qīshíèrchù。
During the re-collation of the dictionary, 72 misuses of words were found.
明明不像你说的那么严重，你也太夸大其辞了！
Míngmíng bú xiàng nǐ shuō de nàme yánzhòng，nǐ yě tài kuādàqící le！
It is not as serious as you said. You exaggerated too much.
他的这篇文章言辞流畅语意联贯，是一篇不错的作品。
Tā de zhèpiān wénzhāng yáncí liúchàng yǔyì liánguàn，shì yì piān búcuò de zuòpǐn。
His essay was verbally smooth, and consistent in content.  It is quite a good article.
我们的作文要炼字炼句，以求文辞精练顺达。
Wǒmen de zuòwén yào liànzì liànjù，yǐqiú wéncí jīngliàn shùndá。
When we write a composition, we should try to find the exact words and sentences to make the diction proficient, smooth, and effectual.
从本质上说，我们的建议没有什么两样，只是措辞不同。
Cóng běnzhì shàng shuō，wǒmen de jiànyì méiyǒu shénme liǎngyàng，zhǐshì cuòcí bùtóng。
Substantially speaking, our suggestions are not different. We have just adopted different diction.
这篇文章文辞妙丽，一定是出自名家之手。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wéncí miàolì，yídìng shì chūzì míngjiā zhī shǒu。
This article is beautiful and smart in diction, so it must be written by a famous master.
判辞的内容能够体现审判的质量和司法状况。
Pàncí de nèiróng nénggòu tǐxiàn shěnpàn de zhìliàng hé sīfǎ zhuàngkuàng。
The contents of court verdicts shall embody the quality of the judgment and the judicial conditions.
他的辖区发生了刑讯迫供的事，他不得不引咎辞职。
Tā de xiáqū fāshēng le xíngxùn pògòng de shì，tā bùdébùyǐnjiù cízhí。
He had to acknowledge his mistake and resign because the use of torture to extort a confession happened within the area he administers.
对于这个关键问题，他总是闪烁其辞，不愿明确回答。
Duìyú zhège guānjiàn wèntí，tā zǒngshì shǎnshuòqící，bú yuàn míngquè huídá。
He hemmed and hawed, giving no direct reply to the key question.
设使你当初不辞职，现在肯定是处长了。
Shèshǐ nǐ dāngchū bùcízhí，xiànzài kěndìng shì chùcháng le。
If you hadn\'t resigned then, you would certainly have become a section chief by now!
自从被辞退后，我就失却了稳定的经济来源。
Zìcóng bèi cítuì hòu，wǒ jiù shīquè le wěndìng de jīngjì láiyuán。
I lost a steady income after I was fired.
由于上级不断施压要求精简人员，我们只能把一部分员工辞退。
Yóuyú shàngjí búduàn shīyā yāoqiú jīngjiǎn rényuán，wǒmen zhǐnéng bǎ yíbùfen yuángōng cítuì。
We had to dismiss some of the staff because higher authorities are constantly demanding streamlining.
杂文言辞犀利，可以针砭世弊。
Záwén yáncí xīlì，kěyǐ zhēnbiān shìbì。
Trenchant essays can criticize contemporary abuses.
我们在党旗下庄严的宣讲过誓辞，要为共产主义事业奋斗终生。
Wǒmen zài dǎngqí xià zhuāngyán de xuānjiǎng guò shìcí，yào wèi gòngchǎnzhǔyì shìyè fèndòu zhōng shēng。
We have sworn solemnly under the party flag that we will work for Communism all our lives.
听说自己被公司辞退了，他爽然不知所措。
Tīngshuō zìjǐ bèi gōngsī cítuì le，tā shuǎngrán bùzhī suǒcuò。
Hearing that he was fired by the company, he was totally at a loss.
他为国庆大典写了激情澎湃的颂辞。
Tā wèi guóqìng dàdiǎn xiě le jīqíng péngpài de sòngcí。
He wrote an exciting eulogy for the celebrations on the National Day.
大会组委会收到了各界人士的题辞。
Dàhuì zǔwěihuì shōudào le gè jiè rénshì de tící。
The organizing committee of the conference has received commemorative words from people in different social communities.
即使看过了彖辞，我对于这个卦义还不是很理解。
Jíshǐ kànguòle tuàncí，wǒ duìyú zhège guàyì hái búshì hĕn lǐjiĕ.
Having read the commentary on the meaning of diagrams in The Book of Changes, I still can\'t understand this divinatory symbol.
他今天说的话只不过是托辞罢了。
Tā jīntiān shuō de huà zhǐbúguò shì tuōcí bà le。
What he said today was just excuses.
他虽然不是外交官，却能熟练地使用外交辞令。
Tā suīrán búshì wàijiāoguān，què néng shúliàn de shǐyòng wàijiāo cílìng。
Although not a diplomat, he can proficiently use diplomatic terms.
你交待的任务我一定会努力完成，万死不辞！
Nǐ jiāodài de rènwù wǒ yídìng huì nǔlì wánchéng，wànsǐ bùcí！
I\'m willing to risk any danger to finish the task you gave me!
对于他的固执己见，大家都颇有微辞。
Duìyú tā de gùzhíjǐjiàn，dàjiā dōu pōyǒu wēicí。
There are murmurs of discontent among us about his stubbornness.
下面，有请张理事长为今天的大会献辞。
Xiàmiàn，yǒu qǐng Zhāng lǐshìzhǎng wèi jīntiān de dàhuì xiàncí。
Now let\'s have our manager Mr. Zhang give a speech for today\'s meeting.
小弟告辞了，兄台请留步，不必相送。
Xiǎodì gàocí le，xiōngtái qǐng liúbù，búbì xiāngsòng。
I have to go now, don\'t bother to see me out.
会议结束的时候，王书记将代表大家致谢辞。
Huìyì jiéshù de shíhou，Wáng shūji jiāng dàibiǎo dàjiā zhì xiècí。
Secretary Wang will give a thank-you speech on behalf of everyone when the meeting is over.
他们寒暄了须臾，也没说什么，就告辞了。
Tāmen hánxuān le xūyú，yě méi shuō shénme，jiù gàocí le。
They exchanged greetings for a while and parted with each other without saying anything more.
副词属于虚辞，有修饰的作用。
Fùcí shǔyú xūcí，yǒu xiū shì de zuòyòng。
The adverb is a kind of form word, which has a modifying function.
演讲比赛上他严辞激烈，把我们都给镇住了。
Yǎnjiǎng bǐsài shàng tā yáncí jīliè，bǎ wǒmen dōu gěi zhènzhù le。
He astonished us in the debate contest with his sharp tongue.
凡是50岁以上的都一刀切地被辞退了。
Fánshì wǔshísuì yǐshàng de dōu yìdāoqiē de bèi cítuì le。
People over fifty are dismissed, without exception.
他义正辞严地拒绝了别人送他的贿赂。
Tā yìzhèng cíyán de jùjué le biérén sòng tā de huìlù。
He refused the bribe with the force of justice.
因为卷入贿赂案，他愤而引咎辞职。
Yīnwéi juǎnrù huìlùàn，tā fènér yǐnjiù cízhí。
Because he was involved in the bribery, he acknowledged his mistake and resigned.
她自己错了，还振振有辞地为自己辩解。
Tā zìjǐ cuò le，hái zhènzhèn yǒucí de wèi zìjǐ biànjiě。
Though she was wrong, she still spoke plausibly, and volubly to defend herself.
老总亲自在新年酒会上念祝辞。
Lǎozǒng qīnzì zài xīnnián jiǔhuì shàng niàn zhùcí。
The president proposed a toast in person at the New Year\'s cocktail party.
他自分不能胜任局长的职务，所以主动请辞。
Tā zì fēn bùnéng shèngrèn júcháng de zhíwù，suǒyǐ zhǔdòng qǐng cí。
He thought he was not qualified to head the bureau and resigned from the post.
辞职的员工离开前要把工作交待给其他人。
Cízhí de yuángōng líkāi qián yào bǎ gōngzuò jiāodài gěi qítā rén。
Workers who want to resign have to transfer their tasks to others before they leave.
这本《英语用法大辞典》是本不错的工具书。
Zhèběn《Yīngyǔ yòngfǎ dàcídiǎn》 shì běn búcuò de gōngjùshū。
This Dictionary of the Usage of the English Language is a very good reference book.
小学生就应该学会在写作的时候使用修辞格。
Xiǎoxuésheng jiù yīnggāi xuéhuì zài xiězuò de shíhou shǐyòng xiūcígé。
Pupils should learn to use figures of speech while learning to write a composition.
虽然领导百般挽留，她毅然决然地辞职下海。
Suīrán lǐngdǎo bǎibān wǎnliú，tā yìrán juérán de cízhí xiàhǎi。
Although her leader used every method to urge her to stay, she is determined to resign and go into business.
那天的追悼会上，他为敬爱的老师致了哀辞。
Nàtiān de zhuīdàohuì shàng，tā wèi jìng\'ài de lǎoshī zhìle\'āicí。
He gave a speech during his teacher\'s funeral.
张教授一生致力于研究修辞学。
Zhāng Jiàoshòu yìshēng zhìlìyú yánjiū xiūcíxué。
Professor Zhang has devoted all his life to the study of rhetoric.
侧面消息证明他已经提交了辞呈。
Cèmiànxiāoxi zhèngmíng tā yǐjīng tíjiāole cíchéng。
Unofficial sources have confirmed that he has already handed in his notice.
他突然辞职，大家都很诧异。
Tā tūrán cízhí，dàjiā dōu hěnchàyì。
When he suddenly resigned everybody was very surprised.
他辞掉了市长的职务。
Tā cídiàole shìzhǎngde zhíwù。
He resigned from his position as mayor.
他被经理辞了。
Tā bèi jīnglǐ cíle。
He was dismissed by the manager.
他辞别了亲人去国外打工。
Tā cíbiéle qīnrén qù guówài dǎgōng。
He bade farewell to his relatives as he left to work overseas.
他向老板递交了辞呈。
Tā xiàng lǎobǎn dìjiāole cíchéng。
He gave his boss his letter of resignation.
外交辞令
wàijiāo cílìng 
diplomatic language
因病辞世
yīnbìngcíshì
pass away due to illness
他因工作不力，被老板辞退。
Tā yīn gōngzuòbúlì，bèi lǎobǎn cítuì。
He wasn\'t hardworking enough, and so was dismissed by the boss.
讨论当中，他言辞激烈。
Tǎolùn dāngzhōng，tā yáncíjīliè。
During the discussion he spoke forcefully.
他当真辞职了？
Tā dàngzhēn cízhí le？

锋利的言辞
fēnglìde yáncí
cutting remarks
告辞
gàocí
take one\'s leave

Wǎnfànhòu tā qǐshēngàocí。
After the meal, he stood up and took his leave.

yǐnjiùcízhí
take the blame and resign
她决意要辞职。
Tā juéyì yào cízhí.
She was determined to resign.
锐利的辞令
ruìlì de cílìng
astute language

Duì zhíyuánmen de xiāngjì cízhí，lǎobǎn gǎndào yíhàn shènzhì tòngkǔ。
The boss felt regret, even distress, about the spate of resignations.
实际行动胜过动人的言辞。
Shíjìxíngdòng shèngguò dòngrén de yáncí。
Actions speak louder than words.
我左一句右一句地劝他别辞职。
Wǒ zuǒyíjù yòuyíjù de quàn tā bié cízhí。
I tried again and again to persuade him not to give up his job.
我要辞职。
Wǒ yào cízhí 。
I want to resign.
我想辞掉现在的工作。
Wǒ xiǎng cídiào xiànzài de gōngzuò 。
I want to quit work now.

rhetorical devices
修辞手段，修辞格
He preferred his erroneous but pleasing mumpsimus to the correct sumpsimus.
Yǔ jīngguò jiūzhèng de zhèngquè cuòcí xiāngbǐ，tā gèng xǐhuan tā de bú zhèngquè dàn què shǐ rén gǎndào yǒuqù de cuòcí。
与经过纠正的正确措辞相比，他更喜欢他的不正确但却使人感到有趣的措辞。
Accepted two or three verbal and rhetorical changes I suggested.
Jiēshòule wǒ suǒ jiànyì de liǎng-sān gè cuòcí hé xiūcí xiūgǎi。
接受了我所建议的两三个措辞和修辞修改。
an airtight alibi
无懈可击的托辞；天衣无缝的不在犯罪现场证据
The barb of his wit made us wince.
他说话措辞的尖刻使我们畏避。
His alibi was a beaut!
他的托辞可真高明！

要不是我需要钱的话，我就辞职了。

滔滔不绝的言辞

逐出某人；使某人漂泊流浪；辞退某人

传说他将辞职

她决定辞去工作，这让我很惊讶。

我乞求他留下来，但他却不辞而别。

我很快就会辞职，因为我真的需要换一下环境。

久病不愈，她终于于上个月辞世了。

她尖酸的言辞，给她带来了很多麻烦。

你认为她的辞职报告里有真话吗？

他的工作很单调，没什么新意，所以他就辞职了。

我想辞职，开间酒吧，但我没那胆量。

她收到了诸位教授的贺辞。

当心你的措辞！

这几个老人每天斗牌，消磨时间。
Zhè jǐgè lǎorén měitiān dòupái，xiāomó shíjiān。
These old men play poker every day to pass the time.
消磨时间。
We usually hang out in the common after class.
我们放学后通常会在广场上消磨时间。
to kill time
消磨时间
to lounge around the house/pool
在家/游泳池消磨时间
The children passed the time playing in the street.
孩子们在街上玩以消磨时间。
They whiled away the hours telling stories.
他们以讲故事消磨时间。
to while away the afternoon
消磨一下午时间
消磨志气
xiāomó zhìqì
sap one\'s will
消磨精力
xiāomó jīnglì
fritter away one\'s energy
消磨时间
xiāomó shíjiān
kill time; pass the time
消磨岁月
xiāomó suìyuè

利萨进入了烦恼的青春期，被疾病和忧郁心理折磨着。
He was branded a traitor and was tortured, then killed.
Tā bèi dǎ chéng pàntú，shòu jìn zhémó，zuìhòu bèi chǔsǐ le。
他被打成叛徒，受尽折磨，最后被处死了。
Now, everyday we have to live here is breaking our spirits.
Xiànzài，wǒmen zài zhèli shēnghuó de měi yìtiān duì wǒmen de jīngshen dōushì jùdà de zhémó。
现在，我们在这里生活的每一天对我们的精神都是巨大的折磨。
For the last five years, a good friend of mine has suffered from panic attacks.
Wǒ de yí wèi hǎoyǒu guòqù wǔ nián lǐ shòu jìn le kǒnghuāng zhèng de zhémó。
我的一位好友过去五年里受尽了恐慌症的折磨。
After many years of illness he finally choked it.
Zài bèi bìngtòng zhémóle hěn duō nián yǐhòu，tā zhōngyú tíngzhǐle hūxī。
在被病痛折磨了很多年以后，他终于停止了呼吸。
From when he was a young man, he had suffered from a chronic lung illness.
Cóng tā niánqīng shí qǐ，tā shòudào mànxìng fèibù jíbìng de zhémó。
从他年轻时起，他受到慢性肺部疾病的折磨。
He will always bear the cross of guilt for what he did.
Tā jiāng yǒngyuǎn wèi tā de suǒzuò-suǒwéi chéngshòu nèijiù de zhémó。
他将永远为他的所作所为承受内疚的折磨。
The conflicting thoughts gnawed at his mind.
Máodùn de xiǎngfǎ zhémózhe tā de tóunǎo。
矛盾的想法折磨着他的头脑。
He endured six weeks of this ordeal before the chance came to escape once again.
Tā zàicì yǒu jīhuì táopǎo zhīqián zāoshòule liù gè xīngqī de zhémó。
他再次有机会逃跑之前遭受了六个星期的折磨。
He is suffering from an ankle injury and a virus infection.
Tā bǎo shòu xīgài shòushāng hé bìngdú gǎnrǎn de zhémó。
他饱受膝盖受伤和病毒感染的折磨。
`How could he possibly let a little innocent girl be bullied and tormented?\'
Tā zěnme kěnéng huì ràng yí gè chúnjié de xiǎonǚhái shòudào qīlíng hé zhémó ne ？
他怎么可能会让一个纯洁的小女孩受到欺凌和折磨呢？
He was invalided by an illness that first afflicted his joints.
Tā yīn yì zhǒng jíbìng ér zhìcán，zhèzhǒng jíbìng zuì chū zhémó zhe tā de guānjié。
他因一种疾病而致残，这种疾病最初折磨着他的关节。
John was taking a break from the hard grind of political life.
Yuēhàn zài zhémó rén de zhèngzhì shēnghuó zhōng mánglǐtōuxián。
约翰在折磨人的政治生活中忙里偷闲。
She felt consumed with the most idiotic resentment.
Tā búduàn shòudào zuì yúchǔn yuànhèn de zhémó。
她不断受到最愚蠢怨恨的折磨。
His guilty conscience was eating at him.
Nèixīn de fùzuìgǎn zhémózhe tā。
内心的负罪感折磨着他。
The silence preyed on my mind and ate into me.
Zhèyàng de chénjì zhémózhe wǒ bìng qīnshí wǒ de nèixīn。
这样的沉寂折磨着我并侵蚀我的内心。
Glad you were not ground down by illness or poverty.

现在正是永远离开那座使他饱受折磨的城镇的时候。

to grind one\'s teeth

不可磨灭的印象
bùkěmómiè de yìnxiàng
an indelible impression
不可磨灭的贡献
bùkěmómiè de gòngxiàn 
an everlasting contribution
不可磨灭的功绩
bùkěmómiè de gōngjì 
ineffaceable merit; unforgettable meritorious deeds
留下难以磨灭的印象
liúxià nányǐmómiè de yìn xiàng
leave an indelible impression
丝绸之路为我国早期与欧洲地区的经济文化交流做出了不可磨灭的贡献。
Sīchóuzhīlù wéi wǒguó zǎoqī yǔ ōuzhōu dìqū de jīngjì wénhuà jiāoliú zuòchūle búkěmómiè de gòngxiàn。
The Silk Road made indelible contributions to the economic and cultural communication between Europe and our country in early years.
他的伟大功绩不可磨灭。
Tā de wěidà gōngjì bùkěmómiè.
His huge achievements cannot be obliterated.
磨灭。
英雄的业绩是不可磨灭的。
A horrible image was burn in her mind.
Tā nǎohǎi lǐ liúxiàle yì fú bùkěmómiè de kǒngbù huàmiàn。
她脑海里留下了一幅不可磨灭的恐怖画面。
He left an indelible mark on the American theater.
Tā duì nà jiā měiguó jùyuàn liúxiàle bùkěmómiè de yǐngxiǎng。
他对那家美国剧院留下了不可磨灭的影响。
This tradition has left its mark indelibly upon the social, political, educational and industrial fabric of this country.
Zhè xiàng chuántǒng yǐjīng gěi zhège guójiā de shèhuì、 zhèngzhì、 jiàoyù hé gōngyè de dǐcéng jiégòu dǎ shàng le bùkěmómiè de yìnjì。
这项传统已经给这个国家的社会、政治、教育和工业的底层结构打上了不可磨灭的印记。
研磨料
yánmóliào
abrasive
This material can stand a lot of wear and tear.
这种材料经得住磨损和撕扯。
The two pairs of millstones are fed with grain by the hoppers.
Cóng liàodǒu lǐ shùn xiàlái de gǔwù bèi sòngjìn móshí。
从料斗里顺下来的谷物被送进磨石。
The new material withstands even the greatest wear and tear.
Zhè zhǒng xīn cáiliào nénggòu jīngshòu zhù nǎpà shì zuì yánzhòng de mósǔn。
这种新材料能够经受住哪怕是最严重的磨损。
经过磨练，他已经可以独立应对工作中的各种困难了。
Jīngguò móliàn，tā yǐjing kěyǐ dúlì yìngduì gōngzuò zhōng de gèzhǒng kùnnan le。
After trials, now he can face all the difficulties at work independently.
在生意场上他还是个嫩弱的新手，还需要磨练。
Zài shēngyìchǎng shàng tā háishi gè nènruò de xīnshǒu，hái xūyào móliàn。
In business circles he is still a weak newcomer who needs more practice.
他开车的技术还不熟练，他后边的车都嫌他磨烦。
Tā kāichē de jìshù hái bùshúliàn，tā hòubiān de chē dōu xián tā mòfán。
He is not enough skilled in driving. Vehicles behind him all complain that he is delaying them.
从小练琴使他的手指头肚儿上磨出了许多茧子。
Cóng xiǎo liànqín shǐ tā de shǒuzhǐtoudùr shàng móchū le xǔduō jiǎnzi。
Many calluses appear on the front part of his fingers due to exercises on the piano from childhood.
All the hardship she experienced tempered her will.
经历的所有艰辛磨练了她的意志。

Bǎ liándāo mó de fēikuài。

别磨蹭了，快走吧。
Bié mócèng le，kuài zǒu ba。

这根井绳快磨断了，换根新的吧。

Bié móyánggōng le，kuài bǎ huó gànwán。
Stop dawdling and finish your work.
车间里的牙轮磨损了，赶快换一个。
Chējiān lǐ de yálún mósǔn le，gǎnkuài huàn yígè。

快走吧，别再磨时间了。

Stop dawdling and get going.
别磨蹭了，快走吧。

在革砥上把你的剃须刀磨快。

After importuning, he finally got the opportunity to perform this time.
这台机器的轮盘由于长时间的使用已经磨损得差不多了。

She was thinking to herself about how ill he looked.
她正在琢磨，他看起来气色不太好。
I have a bee in my bonnet about the way she treated me yesterday.
我一直在琢磨她昨天对我的态度。
He will strip the floorboards, sand it, and polish it.
他要刮除地板涂层，打磨，然后抛光。
We usually hang out in the common after class.
我们放学后通常会在广场上消磨时间。
Many people suffer memory loss, or a clouded memory.
很多人正都饱受记忆力丧失或衰退的折磨。
With a home coffee grinder, you can create fresh pots of coffee made exactly to your taste.
你可以使用家用咖啡研磨机烹制出完全符合自己口味的新鲜咖啡。
The main differences between espresso coffee and drip coffee are the fineness of the grind and the brewing time.
浓缩咖啡和过滤咖啡的主要区别就是碾磨的细度和冲煮的时间不同。
The delusions that dogged him never went away.
错觉一直在折磨着他，挥之不去。
Add the grated cheese to the sauce.
把磨碎的奶酪加入酱汁中。
to beat oneself up about sth
[inf] 因某事而折磨自己
cheese/nutmeg grater
奶酪/肉豆蔻磨碎器
to jump through a hoop {or} hoops
受磨炼
to kill time
消磨时间
to lounge around the house/pool
在家/游泳池消磨时间
The children passed the time playing in the street.
孩子们在街上玩以消磨时间。
to fall prey to sth
[fig] 受某事折磨
to give sth some thought
琢磨某事
the work took its toll on us
这工作让我们受尽折磨
in torment
在折磨中
to wear a hole in sth
在某物上磨出一个洞
to wear thin
[material+] 磨薄
They whiled away the hours telling stories.
他们以讲故事消磨时间。
Dean is suffering from paranoid anxiety.
迪恩饱受妄想性焦虑症的折磨。

人质的情况很糟。很明显他受到了残忍的折磨。

木匠很快就把桌子打磨好了。

不合脚的鞋子会把脚磨得很痛。

这领子里的商标牌磨伤了我的皮肤。

这种材料经得住磨损和撕扯。

饥荒仍然折磨着第三世界的孩子。

这些鞋子都磨坏了。

这种电缆耐磨，使用寿命长。

那些谷物是用来磨成面粉的。

Her cousin\'s look had been full of spite to everyone.
Tā de biǎomèi kànlái yǐjīng yuànhèn suǒyǒu de rén。
他的表妹看来已经怨恨所有的人。
I still nurse anger and resentment from my childhood.
Wǒ Xīnzhōng yījiù huáiyǒu tóngnián shí jiù yǒude nùqì hé yuànhèn。
我心中依旧怀有童年时就有的怒气和怨恨。
Their resentment boiled over into a armed protest.
Tāmen de yuànhèn bàofā chéngle yì chǎng wǔzhuāng kàngyì。
他们的怨恨爆发成了一场武装抗议。
She felt consumed with the most idiotic resentment.
Tā búduàn shòudào zuì yúchǔn yuànhèn de zhémó。
她不断受到最愚蠢怨恨的折磨。
Love, resentment, remorse, all struggled in his heart.
Ài，yuànhèn，huǐhèn zài tā xīnzhōng jiūjié。
爱，怨恨，悔恨在他心中纠结。
He resented my failure to return his call.
Tā yuànhèn wǒ méiyǒu huí tā de diànhuà。
他怨恨我没有回他的电话。
These injustices embittered her even more.
Zhèxiē bù gōngzhèng gèng jìnyíbù jīqǐle tā de yuànhèn。
这些不公正更进一步激起了她的怨恨。
He looked at her accusingly.
Tā yuànhèn de kànzhe tā。
他怨恨地看着她。
He resented the meaninglessness of the tasks they assigned him.
Tā yuànhèn tāmen fēnpèigěi tā de rènwù méiyǒu shénme yìyì。
他怨恨他们分配给他的任务没有什么意义。
He is justifiably bitter.
Tā de yuànhèn shì yǒu lǐyóu de。
他的怨恨是有理由的。
她总是埋怨自己不好，从不抱怨别人。
Tā zǒngshì mányuàn zìjǐ bùhǎo，cóngbú bàoyuàn biéren。
She always puts the blame on herself, and never on others.
我原来并不知道他们两人之间的恩恩怨怨。
Wǒ yuánlái bìng bùzhīdào tāmen liǎngrén zhījiān de ēn\'ēn-yuànyuàn。
Originally I knew nothing about their complicated emotional history.
不要总是抱怨别人对你帮助不够。
Búyào zǒngshì bàoyuàn biéren duì nǐ bāngzhù búgòu。
Don\'t always complain that you haven\'t been given enough help.
他抱怨自己的工资低。
Tā bàoyuàn zìjǐ de gōngzī dī。
He grumbled about his low pay.
这是他的错，不怨你。
Zhè shì tā de cuò，bú yuàn nǐ。
You are not to blame. It\'s his fault.
恩怨分明
ēnyuànfēnmíng
know clearly to whom to show gratitude and against whom to feel resentment
不计较个人恩怨
bú jìjiào gèrén ēnyuàn
not allow oneself to be swayed by personal feelings
他一贯欺压邻里，积怨甚多。
Tā yíguàn qīyā línlǐ，jīyuàn shèn duō。
He always rode roughshod over his neighbours and incurred widespread resentment.
没有理由抱怨
méiyǒu lǐyóu bàoyuàn 
have no grounds for complaint
就这么办吧，我不怕落埋怨。
Jiù zhème bàn ba，wǒ bú pà luò mányuàn。
Let\'s do it that way, then. I don\'t mind taking the blame.
他的话里有埋怨情绪。
Tā de huà lǐ yǒu mányuàn qíngxù。
There was a note of complaint in what he said.
民生凋敝、民怨沸腾、民变峰起的严重危机
mínshēngdiāobì、mínyuàn fèiténg、mínbiàn fēngqǐ de yánzhòngwēijī
a grave crisis of mass impoverishment, seething discontent and widespread revolt
军阀混战，民怨沸腾。
Jūnfá hùnzhàn，mínyuàn fèiténg。
Warlords fought one another and popular grievances ran high.
凄怨的曲调
qīyuàn de qǔdiào
a plaintive tune
吐怨气
tǔ yuànqì 
vent one\'s grievances
他虽然每日抱怨，也无可奈何了。
Tā suīrán měi rì bàoyuàn，yě wúkěnàihé le。
Grumble as he might, he had to put up with it.
睚眦之怨
yázì zhī yuàn
a trifling (or trivial) grievance
面有怨色
miàn yǒu yuànsè
wear a resentful (or discontented) look
《清宫怨》
《Qīnɡɡōnɡyuàn》
The Malice of Empire (a play)
这件事怨我。
Zhèjiànshì yuàn wǒ。
I am to blame for this.
这件事怨不得老李，都怪我。
Zhèjiànshì yuànbude Lǎo Lǐ，dōu guài wǒ。
Lao Li is not to blame for this. It\'s all my fault.
班车坏了，怨不得他们迟到了。
Bānchē huài le，yuànbude tāmen chídào le。
The bus broke down. No wonder they were late.
他怨怪我多嘴。
Tā yuànɡuài wǒ duō zuǐ。
He blamed me for not keeping my mouth shut when I should.
出怨气
chū yuànqì
air one\'s grievances; vent one\'s resentment
一肚子怨气
yí dùzi yuànqì
be full of complaints (or grievances)
唉声叹气，怨天尤人
āishēngtànqì，yuàntiānyóurén。
groaning and sighing and cursing fate
人们对物价上涨颇有怨言。
Rénmen duì wùjià shàngzhǎngpō yǒu yuànyán。
There were a lot of complaints about the rising prices.
老头的语气有些责怨。
Lǎotóu de yǔqì yǒuxiē zéyuàn。
The old man spoke in a somewhat reproachful tone.
以怨报德
yǐyuànbàodé
return evil for good; repay good with evil; requite kindness with ingratitude; bite the hand that feeds one
任劳任怨
rènláorènyuàn
work hard regardless of criticism; willingly bear the burden of office
幽怨
yōuyuàn
hidden bitterness (of a young woman thwarted in love)
怨天尤人
yuàntiānyóurén
blame god and man—blame everyone and everything but oneself
老李常抱怨：到这岁数儿，还有啥熬头儿啊！
Lǎo Lǐ cháng bàoyuàn：dào zhè suìshùr，háiyǒu shá áotóur a！
Lao Li used to complain a lot about seeing no future because of his age.
他不停地抱怨不好的天气。
Tā bùtíng de bàoyuàn bùhǎo de tiānqì。
He keeps complaining about the bad weather.
她眼神幽怨，还羼杂着些许的愤怒和无奈。
Tā yǎnshén yōuyuàn，hái chànzá zhe xiēxǔ de fènnù hé wúnài。
There is a sad look in her eyes, with mingled indignation and helplessness.
她嗔怨丈夫出差回来没给自己带礼物。
Tā chēnyuàn zhàngfū chūchāi huílái méi gěi zìjǐ dài lǐwù。
She complained that her husband didn\'t bring her any gifts when he returned from his business trip.
如果心中的仇怨太多，怎么可能生活得开心呢。
Rúguǒ xīn zhōng de chóuyuàn tài duō，zěnme kěnéng shēnghuó de kāixīn ne。
You can not live a happy life if you carry much hatred.
我们的恩怨就此一笔勾销，从此就做陌路人。
Wǒmen de ēnyuàn jiù cǐ yìbǐgōuxiāo，cóngcǐ jiù zuò mòlùrén。
All the gratitude and resentment between us is forgotten. From now on we will be complete strangers.
我们不要互相怪怨，想想下一步怎么办才是正理。
Wǒmen búyào hùxiāng guàiyuàn，xiǎngxiǎng xiàyíbùzěnme bàn cái shì zhènglǐ。
We shouldn\'t blame each other. The right thing to do is think about what to do next.
这段恩怨积年已久，不是一句两句话就可以解决的。
Zhè duàn ēnyuàn jīnián yǐ jiǔ，búshì yíjù liǎng jù huà jiù kěyǐ jiějué de。
This resentment has been going on for many years, and cannot be dissolved with a few words.
小明不住地抱怨：这么苛重的作业，怎么可能完成呢？
Xiǎo Míng búzhù de bàoyuàn：zhème kēzhòng de zuòyè，zěnme kěnéng wánchéng ne？
Xiaoming is continuously complaining: &quot;how can it be possible to finish so much homework?&quot;
他溘然而来，我们都很意外，都埋怨他来之前怎么没打个招呼。
Tā kèrán ér lái，wǒmen dōu hěnyìwài，dōu mányuàn tā lái zhīqián zěnme méi dǎ gè zhāohū。
We were very surprised that he appeared suddenly and complained that he should have noticed us.
他仰望天空狂呼，抱怨命运的不公平！
Tā yǎngwàng tiānkōng kuánghū，bàoyuàn mìngyùn de bùgōngpíng！
Looking up at the sky, he shouts and complains about the  unfairness of fate.
他一直都过得很困厄，但他从来不曾抱怨命运。
Tā yìzhí dōu guò de hěnkùnè，dàn tā cónglái bùcéng bàoyuàn mìngyùn。
He has been in financial straits, but he has never complained of his fate.
只要你一心为公，就不会落埋怨。
Zhǐyào nǐ yìxīn wèigōng，jiù búhuì lào mányuàn。
As long as you are all heartened for public welfare, you won\'t be blamed.
这个官员的贪污罪行造成民怨沸腾。
Zhège guānyuán de tānwū zuìxíng zàochéng mínyuàn fèiténg。
The people are boiling with resentment over the officials embezzlement.
他们之间究竟盘结着多少恩怨，我也不清楚。
Tāmen zhījiān jiūjìng pánjié zhe duōshǎo ēnyuàn，wǒ yě bùqīngchu。
I don\'t know how many good and bad feelings they have around them.
我喜欢上了羌笛那略带哀怨的音色。
Wǒ xǐhuan shàng le qiāngdí nà lüèdài āiyuàn de yīnsè。
I fell in love with the subtly plaintive timbre of the Qiang flute.
他在公司是做人事工作的强将，经他调动的人都毫无怨言。
Tā zài gōngsī shì zuò rénshì gōngzuò de qiángjiàng，jīng tā diàodòng de rén dōu háowú yuànyán。
He is an able man in Human Resource work, as nobody transferred by him has voiced a complaint.
她一世青灯，临终前都没抱怨半句。
Tā yíshì qīngdēng，lín zhōng qián dōu méi bàoyuàn bànjù。
Although being lonely and bitter life all through her life, she didn\'t make a single complaint before she died.
你不要总埋怨时乖运蹇，不努力是你不能成功的根本原因。
Nǐ búyào zǒng mányuàn shíguāi yùnjiǎn，bùnǔlì shì nǐ bùnéng chénggōng de gēnběn yuányīn。
Don\'t always complain about bad luck. The fundamental reason for your failure is that you haven\'t tried hard enough.
面对日益变换的社会环境，我们不应该抱怨自己的时运不济，而是应该识时务，而后应时而动。
Miànduì rìyì biànhuàn de shèhuì huánjìng，wǒmen bùyīnggāi bàoyuàn zìjǐ de shíyùn bújì，ér shì yīnggāi shí shíwù，ér hòu yìngshí ér dòng。
Faced with the ever-changing society, we should rather make good judgment about current affairs and take corresponding actions than complain about bad luck.
他俩的私怨很深，为什么这样我们都不清楚。
Tā liǎ de sīyuàn hěnshēn，wèishénme zhèyàng wǒmen dōu bùqīngchu。
They bear a deep grudge against each other, but we don\'t know why this is so.
他们的夙怨很深，矛盾不是一天两天了。
Tāmen de sùyuàn hěnshēn，máodùn búshì yìtiān liǎngtiān le。
They bear a deep grudge against each other, which has been going on for quite a long time.
虽然为此丢了工作，可我依然无悔无怨。
Suīrán wèicǐ diū le gōngzuò，kě wǒ yīrán wúhuǐ wúyuàn。
Eventhough I lost my job over it, I have no regrets.
这对怨偶争吵多年，如今终于劳燕分飞。
Zhè duì yuànǒu zhēngchǎo duōnián，rújīn zhōng yú láoyàn fēnfēi。
This unhappy couple has been quarreling for several years and has finally split up.
她对你一直心存怨艾，觉得她的不幸都是你造成的。
Tā duì nǐ yìzhí xīncún yuànyì，juédé tā de búxìng dōushì nǐ zàochéng de。
She hates you, thinking that you cause all her misfortunes.
虽然婚后生活十分困苦，但她毫无怨尤。
Suīrán hūnhòu shēnghuó shífēn kùnkǔ，dàn tā háowú yuànyóu。
Though her life after marriage is poor and hard, she has never complained about it.
受到别人无端谤议，她却没有怨恨什么。
Shòudào biérén wúduān bàngyì，tā què méiyǒu yuànhèn shénme。
She didn\'t complain when facing other people\'s slander.
她抱怨不平等的待遇。
Tā bàoyuàn bùpíngděngde dàiyù。
She complained about the unfair treatment.
小男孩抱怨说爸爸脾气坏。
Xiǎonánhái bàoyuànshuō bàbà píqihuài。
The little boy complained that his dad had a bad temper.
多干点实事，少一点抱怨。
Duō gàndiǎn shíshì，shǎo yìdiǎn bàoyuàn。

没有什么可抱怨的。
Méiyǒu shénme kě bàoyuàn de.
There\'s nothing to complain about.

He couldn\'t go to school when he was young, and to this day he still holds a grudge against his parents.

路德总是抱怨他丈夫的赌博毛病。

他对他老板的抱怨已经发展到了要辞职的程度。

这些顾客抱怨他们点的菜没有上。

这里的居民都抱怨工厂的污染问题。

他真希望他们别再嘟嘟囔囔地抱怨帐单的价钱了.
John complained that they never played with a full deck.

He complained about a pain in his right thigh.
Tā bàoyuànzhe yòu dàtuǐ shàng de téngtòng。

Diaries are perhaps more often a vehicle for complaints.

Neighbors were complaining about the discard in the hallway.

美国保守派经常抱怨他们所看到的是媒体的自由主义偏见。
People were complaining of bed bugs in the hotels.

人们抱怨旅馆的床上有小虫子。
The place was filthy and the neighbours were always complaining.

这个地方很脏，街坊们一直在抱怨。
He is voicing the complaint of all old people.
Tā shuōchūle suǒyǒu lǎorén de bàoyuàn。
他说出了所有老人的抱怨。
There\'s a party going on and there are complaints about too much noise.
Yǒu yí gè jùhuì zhèngzài jǔxíng，suǒyǐ yǒu rén bàoyuàn shēngyīn tài chǎo le。
有一个聚会正在举行，所以有人抱怨声音太吵了。
She\'s complaining about corns on her feet.
Tā zài bàoyuàn jiǎoshàng zhǎng de jīyǎn。
她在抱怨脚上长的鸡眼。
People are crabbing about the price rise for petrol.
Rénmen zài bàoyuàn yóujià de shàngzhǎng。
人们在抱怨油价的上涨。
The neighbours complained and they had to cut the music.
Zuǒlínyòushè yǒusuǒ bàoyuàn，tāmen bùdébù tíngxiàle yīnyuè。
左邻右舍有所抱怨，他们不得不停下了音乐。
The old resentments are still there to fuel the disagreements.
Jiùyuàn réng zài huì jiājù fēnqí。
旧怨仍在会加剧分歧。
Manufacturers complained that the new regulation would cause a rise in their costs.

制造商们抱怨新规定将导致他们成本上涨。
Her cousin\'s look had been full of spite to everyone.
Tā de biǎomèi kànlái yǐjīng yuànhèn suǒyǒu de rén。
他的表妹看来已经怨恨所有的人。
He complained to a senior officer who made a note in the ship\'s log.
Tā xiàng yí wèi zài hánghǎi rìzhì zhōng zuòle jìlù de gāojí guānyuán bàoyuàn。
他向一位在航海日志中做了记录的高级官员抱怨。
She took the punishments meted out to her without a murmur.
Tā jiēshòu gěi tā de chéngfá，érqiě háowúyuànyán。
她接受给她的惩罚，而且毫无怨言。
I still nurse anger and resentment from my childhood.

我心中依旧怀有童年时就有的怒气和怨恨。

因为你的抱怨，我们没有被邀请去参加晚宴。

如果你找不见他们，不要向我们抱怨。

恩怨分明
ēnyuànfēnmíng
know clearly to whom to show gratitude and against whom to feel resentment
不计较个人恩怨
bú jìjiào gèrén ēnyuàn
not allow oneself to be swayed by personal feelings

恩怨
恩怨。

不要计较个人恩怨

méiyǒu lǐyóu bàoyuàn

Looking up at the sky, he shouts and complains about the  unfairness of fate.
他一直都过得很困厄，但他从来不曾抱怨命运。
Tā yìzhí dōu guò de hěnkùnè，dàn tā cónglái bùcéng bàoyuàn mìngyùn。
He has been in financial straits, but he has never complained of his fate.
她一世青灯，临终前都没抱怨半句。
Tā yíshì qīngdēng，lín zhōng qián dōu méi bàoyuàn bànjù。
Although being lonely and bitter life all through her life, she didn\'t make a single complaint before she died.
面对日益变换的社会环境，我们不应该抱怨自己的时运不济，而是应该识时务，而后应时而动。
Miànduì rìyì biànhuàn de shèhuì huánjìng，wǒmen bùyīnggāi bàoyuàn zìjǐ de shíyùn bújì，ér shì yīnggāi shí shíwù，ér hòu yìngshí ér dòng。
Faced with the ever-changing society, we should rather make good judgment about current affairs and take corresponding actions than complain about bad luck.
她抱怨不平等的待遇。
Tā bàoyuàn bùpíngděngde dàiyù。
She complained about the unfair treatment.
小男孩抱怨说爸爸脾气坏。
Xiǎonánhái bàoyuànshuō bàbà píqihuài。
The little boy complained that his dad had a bad temper.
多干点实事，少一点抱怨。
Duō gàndiǎn shíshì，shǎo yìdiǎn bàoyuàn。
Get on with it and stop grumbling.
没有什么可抱怨的。
Méiyǒu shénme kě bàoyuàn de.
There\'s nothing to complain about.
他做了错事不从自身找原因，却抱怨这个，抱怨那个。
cause for complaint
抱怨的缘由
her eternal complaints
她那些没完没了的抱怨
no point in complaining
抱怨也无用

你又开始抱怨谁会什么，谁不会什么了。

别再抱怨了，怎么说也是错了。

别再抱怨了！你也知道进口商品就是很贵。

别再抱怨不想跟我逛街了。

路德总是抱怨他丈夫的赌博毛病。

他对他老板的抱怨已经发展到了要辞职的程度。

这些顾客抱怨他们点的菜没有上。

这里的居民都抱怨工厂的污染问题。

他真希望他们别再嘟嘟囔囔地抱怨帐单的价钱了.
John complained that they never played with a full deck.
Yuēhàn bàoyuàn tāmen cóngbù lǐzhì。

He complained about a pain in his right thigh.
Tā bàoyuànzhe yòu dàtuǐ shàng de téngtòng。

Búyào zài bàoyuàn mén kāizhe le。
不要再抱怨门开着了。

人们抱怨旅馆的床上有小虫子。

这个地方很脏，街坊们一直在抱怨。

Tā shuōchūle suǒyǒu lǎorén de bàoyuàn。

She\'s complaining about corns on her feet.
Tā zài bàoyuàn jiǎoshàng zhǎng de jīyǎn。

She was grumbling about being called out at such a late hour.

法国在二十世纪七十年代和八十年代的时候经济萧条。
The world financial depression is a major constraint to our domestic economy development.
世界性的金融大萧条是限制我国经济发展的主要因素。
A long depression disposed the stock market to distrust.
长时间的萧条使人们对股票市场失去了信心。

大萧条让他心神俱疲。

战争结束后，原本繁华的城市已是花草残败，一片萧条。
Zhànzhēng jiéshù hòu，yuánběn fánhuá de chéngshì yǐ shì huācǎo cánbài，yí piàn xiāotiáo。
After the war, the cities were in ruins.
小王是个墨守陈规的人，萧规曹随正是他的行事风格。
Xiǎo Wáng shì gè mòshǒuchénguī de rén，xiāoguīcáosuí zhèngshì tā de xíngshì fēnggé。
Xiao Wang is a conservative person who strictly follows the established rules.
今天是怎么了？大街上人迹萧然。
Jīntiān shì zěnme le？Dàjiē shàng rénjì xiāorán。
What is happening today? The street is almost empty.
她家四壁萧然，空空荡荡什么都没有。
Tā jiā sìbì xiāorán，kōngkōngdàngdàng shénme dōu méiyǒu。
There is nothing but four walls inside her home.
除了孤独，一个人在岛上的生活倒也萧然。
Chúle gūdú，yígèrén zài dǎo shàng de shēnghuó dàoyě xiāorán。
Apart from loneliness, there is nothing unpleasant about living on an island alone.
无法排遣的萧疏让他感觉无比孤单。
Wúfǎ páiqiǎn de xiāoshū ràng tā gǎnjué wúbǐ gūdān。
He couldn\'t dispel his loneliness and felt very lonesome.
这里以前是个繁华的闹市，只可惜现在草木萧疏。
Zhèlǐ yǐqián shì gè fánhuá de nàoshì，zhī kěxī xiànzài cǎomù xiāoshū。
This place used to be a crowed market, but it is deserted now.
由于市场萧条，公司的库房已经胀库了。
Yóuyú shìchǎng xiāotiáo，gōngsī de kùfáng yǐjing zhàngkù le。
Because of the depressed market, the company\'s storehouse is completely packed.
车辚辚，马萧萧。

Chopin\'s works
萧邦的作品
France had an economic depression in 1970s and 1980s.
法国在二十世纪七十年代和八十年代的时候经济萧条。
The world financial depression is a major constraint to our domestic economy development.
世界性的金融大萧条是限制我国经济发展的主要因素。
A long depression disposed the stock market to distrust.
长时间的萧条使人们对股票市场失去了信心。
Great depression fatigues his mind and spirit.
大萧条让他心神俱疲。
A lot of industrial workers got laid off during the depression.
经济大萧条期间，大量工人被解雇。
Many industrial companies laid off employees during the depression.
经济大萧条期间，许多工业企业都进行了裁员。
Depression also gave the insurance a deadly blow.
大萧条也给了保险业以致命的打击。
A gold reserve can be a good preparation for the possible depression.
一定量的黄金储备是应对可能发生的经济萧条的必要措施。
Retail business is in general depression now.
零售业现在处在大范围萧条状态。
We are currently facing an economic depression.
Wǒmen xiànzài zhèng miànduì jīngjì dà xiāotiáo。
我们现在正面对经济大萧条。
The Great Depression forced families into poverty.
Dà xiāotiáo shǐ jiātíng xiànrù pínqióng。
大萧条使家庭陷入贫穷。
My grandmother had experienced life during the Great Depression.
Dàxiāotiáo shíqī，wǒ zǔmǔ lìjīngle shēnghuó de mónàn。
大萧条时期，我祖母历经了生活的磨难。
This caused a downward spiral into depression.
Zhè shǐ jīngjì xiàhuá èhuà wèi jīngjì xiāotiáo。
这使经济下滑恶化为经济萧条。
The word &quot;depression&quot; can cover a lot of territory.
“ Xiāotiáo” zhège cí kěyǐ fùgài hěn dà de fànwéi。
“萧条”这个词可以覆盖很大的范围。
This combination was the financial engine of the Great Depression.
Tāmen jiéhé dào yìqǐ gòuchéngle dàxiāotiáo shíqī de cáizhèng yǐnqíng。
它们结合到一起构成了大萧条时期的财政引擎。
I believe it will evolve into a depression.
Wǒ xiāngxìn jiēxiàlái huì yǎnbiàn chéng xiāotiáo。
我相信接下来会演变成萧条。
It will be a long haul out of recession.
Xiāotiáoqī huì chíxù shàng yí duàn shíjiān。
萧条期会持续上一段时间。
The clarinetist fitted a new reed onto his mouthpiece.
Nà wèi chuī mù xiāo zhě zài tā de xiāo zuǐ shàng zhuāngle yígè xīn huángpiàn。
那位吹木箫者在他的萧嘴上装了一个新簧片。
The rising inflation depressed the economy.

攀升的通货膨胀使经济日益萧条。
Industries hit hard by the depression.
