Zhè suǒ Dàxué miànlín zài Nánbùfēizhōu suōjiǎn tóuzī de yālì。
这所大学面临在南部非洲缩减投资的压力。
Stress is a vasoconstrictor.
Yālì shì yì zhǒng xuèguǎnshōusuō jì。
压力是一种血管收缩剂。
Physical effects of coke use include constricted blood vessels, dilated pupils, and increased temperature, heart rate, and blood pressure.
使用可卡因后身体会出现很多症状，如血管收缩、瞳孔放大、体温上升、心率加快和血压升高。
这些模型都是根据实物按一定比例微缩而成的。
Zhèxiē móxíng dōushì gēnjù shíwù àn yídìng bǐlì wēisuō ér chéng de。
These models are all scaled down from the original objects to a certain proportion.

suō wēi jiāo piàn
microfiche
缩微照相
suōwēi zhào xiàng 
microphotograph

缩微胶片。

在困难面前从不退缩
zài kùnnan miàn qián cóngbú tuìsuō 
never flinch from difficulty
面对困难，她非特毫不退缩，还积极寻求解决办法。
Miànduì kùnnan，tā fēitè háo bùtuìsuō，hái jījí xúnqiú jiějué bànfǎ。
Instead of flinching from the difficulties, she strived to find solutions.
虽然荆棘载途，他也没有退缩。
Suīrán jīngjízǎitú，tā yě méiyǒu tuìsuō。
每次遇到困难你就退缩，真是个窝囊废！
Měi cì yùdào kùnnan nǐ jiù tuìsuō，zhēnshì gè wōnángfèi！
You shrink whenever you encounter difficulties, what a worthless wretch!
虽然荆姮载途，他也没有退缩。
Suīrán jīnghéngzǎitú，tā yě méiyǒu tuìsuō。
Although the path was beseted with difficulties and obstructions, he did not flinch.
无论受到什么挫折，我们都不会退缩。
Wúlùn shòudào shénme cuòzhé，wǒmen dōu búhuì tuìsuō。
No matter what setbacks we meet, we can\'t go back now.
退缩。
尽管环境异常艰苦，可是没有一个人退缩。
刚爬出碉堡的敌人又退缩回去。
在困难面前不退缩。
She winced inwardly as his face paled from the stab wound.
看到他由于刺伤而变得苍白的脸，她心里有些退缩了。
Many people shrink before danger, but not me.
许多人会在危险面前退缩，但我不会。
Many people will recoil before substantial danger.
重大危险面前，很多人会退缩。
We will not shrink from the difficult choices we have to make.
Zài bìxū zuòchū jiānnán xuǎnzé shí，wǒmen juébú tuìsuō。
在必须做出艰难选择时，我们绝不退缩。
Unfortunately, many people chicken out at the last moment.
Búxìng de shì，hěn duō rén dōu zài zuìhòu shíkè línzhèntuìsuō。
不幸的是，很多人都在最后时刻临阵退缩。
Elderly patients cower in terror as two nurses battle it out on a ward!
Zài liǎng míng hùshi wèi bìngfáng yìjuéshèngfù de shíhou，niánzhǎng de bìngrén zài kǒngjù zhōng tuìsuō le。
在两名护士为病房一决胜负的时候，年长的病人在恐惧中退缩了。
Many people drew back out of fear.
Xǔduō rén dōu yīnwèi hàipà ér tuìsuō le。
许多人都因为害怕而退缩了。
The government would not yield to pressure，she promised.
Tā chéngnuò miànduì yālì zhèngfǔ juébútuìsuō。
她承诺面对压力政府绝不退缩。
I was going to tell him but I got cold feet.
Wǒ běn dǎsuan gàosu tā，dàn què línzhèntuìsuō le。
我本打算告诉他，但却临阵退缩了。
He winced at the detected flicker of irony in her voice.
Tā zài tā xīlì de lěngcháorèfěng zhōng tuìsuō le。
他在她犀利的冷嘲热讽中退缩了。
My opponent was wilting.
Wǒ de duìshǒu tuìsuō le。
我的对手退缩了。
She flinched when they showed the slaughtering of the calf.
Dāng tāmen zhǎnshì zǎishā xiǎo niú de chǎngjǐng shí，tā xiàde zhí tuìsuō。
当他们展示宰杀小牛的场景时，她吓得直退缩。
The very easiness of the deed held her back.
Nà jiàn shìqing de jíqí róngyì fǎn\'ér shǐ tā tuìsuō。
那件事情的极其容易反而使她退缩。
我国经济已经出现了通货紧缩的迹象，必须及时加以控制。
Wǒ guó jīngjì yǐjing chūxiàn le tōnghuò jǐnsuō de jì xiàng，bìxū jíshí jiāyǐ kòngzhì。
The economy is showing signs of deflation, which should be curbed in time.
为了节约开支，各部门的定编还要缩减。

政府已经缩减了开支的增长。
Recent glacial recession is alarming to scientists.

他们缩减了销售部门的预算以后，才发现得不偿失。

Shìzhǎng tíyì dàfú suōjiǎn chéngshì yùsuàn。

suōjiǎn jūnfèi
cut back military expenditure
缩水率高达每10米15公分
suōshuǐlǜ gāo dá měi shímǐ shíwǔgōngfēn
a shrinkage of 15cm in a length of 10m.
缩小范围
suōxiǎo fànwéi
reduce the scope; narrow the range
逐步缩小城乡差别
zhúbùsuōxiǎo chéngxiāng chābié
gradually reduce the distinction between town and country
他的毛衣放到热水里一洗就缩小了。
Tā de máoyī fàng dào rèshuǐ lǐ yì xǐ jiù suōxiǎo le。
His sweater shrank when he washed it in hot water.
这件衣服刚洗了头水就缩了好多。
Zhèjiàn yīfu gāngxǐ le tóushuǐ jiù suō le hǎo duō。
This coat shrank badly in the first wash.
缩成一团
suō chéngyìtuán 
curl up into a ball
在困难面前从不退缩
zài kùnnan miàn qián cóngbú tuìsuō 
never flinch from difficulty
肝萎缩
gān wěisuō 
hepatatrophy; atrophy of the liver
肌肉萎缩
jīròu wěisuō 
muscular atrophy; amyotrophy
在困难面前从不畏缩
zài kùnnan miànqián cóngbú wèisuō 
never shrink (or flinch) from difficulty
空气是可以压缩的气体。
Kōngqì shì kěyǐ yāsuō de qìtǐ。
Air is a compressible gas.
压缩开支
yāsuō kāizhī
cut down (or reduce) expenses; retrench
叶片式压缩机
yèpiànshì yāsuōjī
vane compressor
缩短载途时间
suōduǎn zàitú shíjiān
shorten the route
物体热则胀，冷则缩。
Wùtǐ rè zé zhàng，lěngzé suō。
Objects expand when heated and contract when cooled.
缩微照相
suōwēi zhào xiàng 
microphotograph
缩短总装时间，以减少耗费
suōduǎn zǒngzhuāngshíjiān，yǐ jiǎnshǎo hàofèi 
cut costs by shortening assembly time
浓缩汤料
nóngsuō tāngliào
concentrated soup
小狐狸蜷缩在草丛间，不住地哀嚎。
Xiǎohúli quánsuō zài cǎocóng jiān，búzhù de āiháo。
The little fox curls up in grass, howling in sorrow.
她被吓得搐缩在墙角，不停的抖动着身子。
Tā bèi xià de chùsuō zài qiángjiǎo，bùtíng de dǒudòng zhe shēnzi。
She was frightened and shrank to the corner of the wall, her body shivering.
敌占区的面积在不断地缩小。
Dízhànqū de miànjī zài búduàn de suōxiǎo。
The area occupied by the enemy is decreasing day by day.
为了节约开支，各部门的定编还要缩减。
Wèile jiéyuē kāizhī，gè bùmén de dìngbiān háiyào suōjiǎn。
In order to save money, the number of fixed employees in each department has to be reduced.
面对困难，她非特毫不退缩，还积极寻求解决办法。
Miànduì kùnnan，tā fēitè háo bùtuìsuō，hái jījí xúnqiú jiějué bànfǎ。
Instead of flinching from the difficulties, she strived to find solutions.
走高速公路可以缩短旅途时间。
Zǒu gāosù gōnglù kěyǐ suōduǎn lǚtú shíjiān。
The trip will be shortened if we drive on the expressway.
他老是拱肩缩背的，显得很没有精气神。
Tā lǎoshì gǒngjiān suōbèi de，xiǎnde hěnméiyǒu jīngqìshén。
He is always hunching his shoulders and bowing his back, which makes him lack spirit and energy.
用绘图板画图直接缩短了画画的时间，提高了工作效率。
Yòng huìtúbǎn huàtú zhíjiē suōduǎn le huàhuà de shíjiān，tígāo le gōngzuò xiàolǜ。
Drawing board software shortens drawing time and raises working efficiency.
因河口急骤缩小，洪水流势愈来愈大。
Yīn hékǒu jízhòu suōxiǎo，hóngshuǐ liúshì yù lái yù dà。
Due to the sudden narrowness of the estuary, the flood flowed higher and higher.
机械手缩回机舱内，捧着一块用记忆合金制造的卫星天线残片。
Jīxièshǒu suōhuí jīcāng nèi，pěng zhe yí kuài yòng jìyì héjīn zhìzào de wèxīng tiānxiàn cánpiàn。
The robot arm retracted into the cabin, holding a remnant of satellite aerial made of shape memory alloy.
压缩机的减压阀被安装错了，不能正常使用。
Yāsuōjī de jiǎnyāfá bèi ānzhuāng cuò le，bùnéng zhèngcháng shǐyòng。
The compression release valve of the compressor has been misplaced, so it doesn\'t work properly.
这篇文章太过冗长，要简缩一下。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng tài guò rǒngcháng，yào jiǎnsuō yíxià。
The essay is too wordy, you\'d better condense it.
这月的工资快花完了，后半月只能紧衣缩食了。
Zhèyuè de gōngzī kuài huāwán le，hòubànyuè zhǐnéng jǐnyīsuōshí le。
I have to tighten my belt for the rest of the month, as I have quickly spent this month\'s salary.
虽然荆棘载途，他也没有退缩。
Suīrán jīngjízǎitú，tā yě méiyǒu tuìsuō。
果树的叶子卷缩了，是不是染上了什么病虫害？
Guǒshù de yèzi juǎnsuō le，shìbushì rǎnshàng le shénme bìngchónghài？
The leaves of the fruit trees are folding and shrinking, is it because of some plant diseases or insect pests?
热胀冷缩是大家都知道的常识。
Rèzhàng lěngsuō shì dàjiā dōu zhīdào de chángshí。
It is common sense to every one that an object expands when hot, and contracts when cold.
名物制度是历史文化的浓缩与概括。
Míngwù zhìdù shì lìshǐ wénhuà de nóngsuō yǔ gàikuò。
The system of things and their names is the concentration, and epitome of historical civilization.
为了缩短路上所花的时间，我一般不买普客票。
Wèile suōduǎn lùshàng suǒ huā de shíjiān，wǒ yìbān bùmǎi pǔkè piào。
To reduce time wasted on the journey, I usually don\'t take the slow train.
热胀冷缩是一种自然现象。
Rèzhàng lěngsuō shì yìzhǒng zìrán xiàn xiàng。
Expanding with heat and contracting with cold is a natural phenomenon.
这块布料经过水洗就缩水了。
Zhèkuài bùliào jīngguò shuǐxǐ jiù suōshuǐ le。
This cloth shrank after being washed in water.

Míngzhù suōlüèbǎn hěnshìhé értóng yuèdú。
Simplified editions of famous works are suitable for children to read.
昂贵的房价使很多购房者不得不缩衣节食。
Ángguì de fángjià shǐ hěnduō gòufángzhě bùdébù suōyījiéshí。
The sky-high price of houses forced many buyers to stint on food and clothes.
缩印本的书籍适合旅行中携带阅读。

Reduced size books are suitable for travelers to carry and read.
弹力袜看着很小，其实伸缩性很大。

Though they seem to be very small, stretch socks have great elasticity.
我国经济已经出现了通货紧缩的迹象，必须及时加以控制。

The economy is showing signs of deflation, which should be curbed in time.
这些模型都是根据实物按一定比例微缩而成的。

These models are all scaled down from the original objects to a certain proportion.
每次遇到困难你就退缩，真是个窝囊废！
Měi cì yùdào kùnnan nǐ jiù tuìsuō，zhēnshì gè wōnángfèi！
You shrink whenever you encounter difficulties, what a worthless wretch!
缩句就是在不改变原意的条件下将句子的羡余部分去掉。
Suōjù jiùshì zài bùgǎibiàn yuányì de tiáojiàn xià jiāng jùzi de xiànyú bùfēn qùdiào。
Abbreviating a sentence means cutting out the redundant parts of the sentence without changing its original meaning.

虽然荆姮载途，他也没有退缩。

Zài yìngyòng yǔfǎ fēnxī shí，“the dog\'s owner （gǒuzhǔrén）”bèi xiěchéng“the owner of the dog（gǒu de zhǔrén）”。
在应用语法分析时，“the dog\'s owner（狗主人）”被写成“the owner of the dog（狗的主人）”。
As well as the traditional topics of analysis and differential equations, the degree offers newer topics as well.
Chúle chuántǒng de jiěxī hé wēijīfēn gōngshì děng zhǔtí zhīwài，zhège xuéwèi hái tígōng gēngxīn de zhǔtí。
除了传统的解析和微积分公式等主题之外，这个学位还提供更新的主题。
Analysis, psychotherapy and the chemical and physical therapies all treat the patient alone.

Good analysts much prefer doing interesting and challenging work to find the reasons for things.

好的分析家很喜欢从事那些有趣并带有挑战性的发现事物原因的工作。

分析家预测，未来几年中将会发生一次并购风潮。
Analysts usually ask patients about their dreams to understand what is wrong with them.

心理分析医生通常会询问病人所做的梦，以此来获知病人存在的问题。
Law school mainly focuses on the development of analytical skills.
Fǎxuéyuàn zhǔyào guānzhù fēnxī nénglì de fāzhǎn。
法学院主要关注分析能力的发展。
Analytical truths or propositions do not require hard facts to be proven true.
Fēnxī xìng yuánlǐ huò mìngtí bìng bù yāoqiú quèzáo de zhèngjù qù zhèngmíng shìshí de zhèngquèxìng。
分析性原理或命题并不要求确凿的证据去证明事实的正确性。

Wǒmen jīngcháng yòng diànnǎo lái fēnxī shùjù。

精神病医师使用不同方法对其病人进行精神分析。

精神分析学家
jīngshén fēnxī xuéjiā
psychoanalyst
Analysis, psychotherapy and the chemical and physical therapies all treat the patient alone.
Jīngshen fēnxī、jīngshen liáofǎ yǐjí huàxué yǔ wùlǐ zhìliáo fǎ，dōu néng dāndú yònglái zhìliáo bìngrén。

I was analyzed in Vienna by a famous psychiatrist.

A psychiatrist analyzes his patients using various methods.

恋母情节是精神分析学的分支。
In psychoanalysis, cathexis is the libido\'s charge of energy.

独立分析问题和解决问题的能力
dúlì fēnxī wèntí hé jiějué wèntí de nénglì
ability to analyse and solve problems on one\'s own
培养分析问题和解决问题的能力
péiyǎng fēnxī wèntí hé jiějué wèntí de nénglì
cultivate the ability to analyse and solve problems
分析问题是解决问题的基点。
Fēnxī wèntí shì jiějué wèntí de jīdiǎn。
The analysis of a problem is the starting point for its solution.
解析。
解析老庄哲学的精髓。

对句子进行语法分析后，你应该能更好的理解句义。

定性分析确定物质或混合物的化学成分。

在应用语法分析时，“the dog\'s owner（狗主人）”被写成“the owner of the dog（狗的主人）”。

Jīngshénbìng yīshī shǐyòng bùtóng fāngfǎ duì qí bìngrén jìnxíng jīngshen fēnxī。

fēnxī jùzi chéngfèn
parse a sentence

The economist\'s analysis was really penetrating.

ànlì fēnxī

定量分析

huò chí huò zǎo

宣判已经被推迟到了晚些时候。
You can\'t be late for work again.
Nǐ bù kěyǐ zài shàngbān chídào le。
你不可以再上班迟到了。
He was an hour late.
Tā chídàole yì xiǎoshí。
他迟到了一小时。
He assumed to be on time, even though he was late.
Jǐnguǎn tā chídàole，dàn tā háishì jiǎzhuāng ànshí dào le。
尽管他迟到了，但他还是假装按时到了。
She checked herself before she said it outloud.
Tā chíyí le yíxià，ránhòu dàshēng de shuōle chūlái。
她迟疑了一下，然后大声地说了出来。
It gravels me that she doesn\'t call when she knows she\'ll be late.
Tā míngmíng yǐjīng zhīdào yào chídàole，què bù lái gè diànhuà，zhè tài ràng wǒ shēngqì le。
她明明已经知道要迟到了，却不来个电话，这太让我生气了。
I guess he\'ll be late again as usual.

我想你又要像往常一样迟到了。
Since I am already late, whether I go now or later will amount to the same thing.
Jìrán wǒ yǐjīng chídàole，wǒ xiànzài zǒu hé guò huìer zǒu bìng méiyǒu shénme bùtóng。
既然我已经迟到了，我现在走和过会儿走并没有什么不同。
We were late for the party and I had to change up.

我们去晚会就要迟到了，所以我不得不加快了车速。

快一点，不然我们要迟到了。
Don\'t make a mountain out of a molehill, he\'s only few minutes late.

If you can\'t decide what to wear，and end up turning up later，then more fool you.

如果你因为无法决定穿什么而最终迟到了，就真是太傻了。
He was late for chapel.

他做礼拜时迟到了。

I\'m late for the plane.

我迟到了，没有赶上飞机。
So dense he never understands anything I say to him.

His responses have slowed with age.

The mind of the audience is becoming dulled.

She gave me a black stare because I was so late.

她瞪了我一眼，因为我迟到太久了。
His case was put back because of the lack of evidence.
他的案子由于证据不足被推迟审判了。

他刚好及时回来，躲过了迟来的大雷雨。

史密斯先生教训了迟到的学生。
I belatedly wished her a happy birthday.
Wǒ sòngqùle chídào de shēngrì zhùfú。
我送去了迟到的生日祝福。
Kevin made a long explanation for his absence.
凯文为他的迟到辩解了很久。
He paused uncertainly.
Tā chíyí de tíngle xiàlái。
他迟疑地停了下来。

他毫不迟疑地采取了行动

I got told off for being out too late.

我宁肯熬夜，也不要迟交作业。

jìnzhǎn chíhuǎn 
make slow progress

rapid (sluggish) flow; rushing current
迟缓。

我确信他昨天出去了，所以今天他的迟到不是偶然。
Carl sat down and had breakfast although it was late for the lesson.
尽管上课要迟到了，卡尔还是坐下来吃了早餐。
You don\'t have to apologize, it can happen to anybody to be late.
你没有必要道歉，任何人都有可能迟到。
I\'ll meet you at the East gate of the school and try not to be late.
我会在学校东门等你，尽量不迟到。
We are late, the guys are already at the airport waiting for us.
我们迟到了，那些人已经在机场等我们了。
I like the way you work, that\'s all very well, but you\'re always late!
我喜欢你的工作方式，非常好，可你总是迟到。
I\'m really mad at you, you\'re always late.
我真要被你气疯了，你总是迟到。
The meeting is tomorrow at 11 a.m., don\'t be late please!
明天上午十一点开会，请别迟到。
We will get late to the party only because of you.
就是因为你，我们去宴会都要迟到了。
She wanted to murder me because I was 2 hours late.
我迟到了两个小时，她简直都想把我杀了。
Jack is really serious about working, he is never late and works with no rest.
杰克工作很认真，从不迟到，而且不知疲倦。
We are late because we got stuck in traffic.
因为遇到堵车，所以我们迟到了。
She gave the weakest of excuses when asked why she was so late.
当问到她为什么迟到时，她给了一个很站不住脚的借口。
He was two hours late because of the traffic.
由于交通不畅，他迟到了整整两个小时。
He arrived too late to our first date and I am like, so upset.
我们第一次约会他就迟到了，当时我简直是气炸了。
They were late for the expo,  but it didn\'t seem to matter.
他们去展会迟到了，但好像也无大碍。
We were late because we were snowed in.
我们被大雪困住，所以迟到了。
As ever, she came late to work.
像往常一样，她上班又迟到了。
I\'m tired of listening to her excuses for always coming late.
我已经听腻了她为自己迟到而开脱的借口。
I was too late and I couldn\'t get in the class.
我迟到时间太长了，不能进班级了。
I was late for the meeting so I started running, and when I got there I was totally out of breath.
因为开会快迟到了，我就开始跑步前进，所以赶到那儿时，已经是上气不接下气了。
We arrived late because we were going into the wrong direction.
我们走错了方向，所以迟到了。
He is always late, but to give him his due, he is very easy going.
他总是迟到，但平心而论，他很好相处。
It\'s not my fault that we are late!
我们迟到又不是我的错！
She glanced at her watch just to make sure that she was not late.
她扫了一眼表，确定她没有迟到。
We have to breakfast hurriedly, or we are late.
我们得快点儿吃早饭啦，要不然就迟到了。
He was already late for his appointment.
他约会已经迟到了。
He\'s always late.
他总是迟到。
had it not been for Bill, we\'d have been late
若不是比尔，我们一定迟到了
she was very angry, for he was late again
她非常生气，因为他又迟到了
I apologize for my late arrival.
真抱歉，我迟到了。
Steve arrived late.
史蒂夫迟到了。
we\'re late
我们迟到了
sorry I\'m late
对不起，我迟到了
to be 10 minutes late
迟到10分钟
why is he always late?
为什么他总是迟到？
Fred made a story to explain why he was late.
弗莱德编了个故事为自己的迟到辩解。
Kevin made a long explanation for his absence.
凯文为他的迟到辩解了很久。
It\'s late. I have to split.
要迟到了，我得先溜了。
It is unbusinesslike to arrive late for meetings.
开会迟到不是办正事的态度.
The visit to the winery has be put off till next month.
参观酿酒厂已推迟到下个月。
In general, John is very punctual. It\'s unusual for him to be late.
约翰总的说来是个很守时的人。他迟到太少见了。
He was almost late for school!
Tā shàngxué chàdiǎnr jiù chídào le！
他上学差点儿就迟到了！
Sentencing has been deferred to a later date.
Xuānpàn yǐjīng bèi tuīchí dàole wǎnxiē shíhou。
宣判已经被推迟到了晚些时候。
They table the meeting for another date.
Tāmen bǎ huìyì tuīchí dào lìngyī tiān。
他们把会议推迟到另一天。
You can\'t be late for work again.
Nǐ bù kěyǐ zài shàngbān chídào le。
你不可以再上班迟到了。
Anyhow, I have to go I\'m late for work.
Bùguǎnzěnyàng，wǒ bùdébù zǒu le，wǒ shàngbān jiùyào chídào le。
不管怎样，我不得不走了，我上班就要迟到了。
He was an hour late.
Tā chídàole yì xiǎoshí。
他迟到了一小时。
She gave me a black stare because I was so late.
Tā dèngle wǒ yìyǎn，yīnwèi wǒ chídào tài jiǔ le。
她瞪了我一眼，因为我迟到太久了。
He assumed to be on time, even though he was late.
Jǐnguǎn tā chídàole，dàn tā háishì jiǎzhuāng ànshí dào le。
尽管他迟到了，但他还是假装按时到了。
Please make certain that you do not arrive late.
Qǐng nòng qīngchǔ nǐ méiyǒu chídào。
请弄清楚你没有迟到。
Don\'t wait up for me, I may be late.
Bú yào děng wǒ，wǒ kěnéng huì chídào de。
不要等我，我可能会迟到的。
He\'s always punctual, and I\'m always late.
Tā zǒngshì hěn zhǔnshí，wǒ zǒng chídào。
他总是很准时，我总迟到。
An unexpected encounter a childhood friend was the reason she was late.

与少年时代一位朋友的不期而遇是她迟到的原因。
It gravels me that she doesn\'t call when she knows she\'ll be late.
Tā míngmíng yǐjīng zhīdào yào chídàole，què bù lái gè diànhuà，zhè tài ràng wǒ shēngqì le。
她明明已经知道要迟到了，却不来个电话，这太让我生气了。
I guess he\'ll be late again as usual.

我想你又要像往常一样迟到了。
Since I am already late, whether I go now or later will amount to the same thing.

既然我已经迟到了，我现在走和过会儿走并没有什么不同。
She was no longer in the habit of being late.

We were late for the party and I had to change up.

No more! I will not be late ever again.

The case was ordered to stand over till Friday.
Gāi ànjiàn bèi lèlìng tuīchí dào xīngqīwǔ。
该案件被勒令推迟到星期五。
After being scolded for being late, he took his medicine and became punctual.
Yīn chídào zāo zébèi hòu， tā zìrèn dǎoméi， biàn de zhǔnshí le。
因迟到遭责备后，他自认倒霉，变得准时了。
I got told off for being out too late.
Wǒ yīn chídào tài jiǔ ér bèi zébèi le。
我因迟到太久而被责备了。

I\'m late for the plane.

If we come to that problem, we\'ll cross that bridge when we come to it.

不得迟误
bùdé chíwù 
admit of no delay

háo bùchíyán de zhíxíngmìnglìng

Tā chízǎo huì lái de。

yánchí jiāohuà

tuīchí xíngqī

chí wèi zuòfù 
have not been able to reply sooner

chídùn
slow (in thought or action); obtuse

Tā bǎ shìqing dāngēle，zuìzhōng tài chí le。
他把事情耽搁了，最终太迟了。
Guests should never be late to a dinner party.
Kèrén chūxí wǎnyàn shí bùyīng chídào。
客人出席晚宴时不应迟到。
I belatedly wished her a happy birthday.
Wǒ sòngqùle chídào de shēngrì zhùfú。
我送去了迟到的生日祝福。
He swung late on the fastball.
Tā zài jī nàgè kuàiqiú shí dòngzuò chí le。
他在击那个快球时动作迟了。
Tardy children are sent to the principal.
Chídào de háizi bèi dàiqù xiàozhǎng nàr。
迟到的孩子被带去校长那儿。
And the long-term nature of pensions ensures that their reckoning is delayed.
yǎnglǎojīn de chángqīxìng quèbǎole tāmen de chéngfá déyǐ tuīchí。
养老金的长期性确保了它们的惩罚得以推迟。
The company runs like a well-oiled machine , and customers love it .
公司生意兴隆，就像一台上好的机器运转顺利，深受顾客欢迎。

隆重
lóngzhòng
grand; solemn; ceremonious

The Imperial Collection of Four was compiled during the reign of Emperor Qianlong.
他的新店开张后，一直是生意昌隆。
Tā de xīn diàn kāizhāng hòu，yìzhí shì shēngyì chānglóng。
Business has been brisk since his new shop opened.
乾隆皇帝在北京称尊继位了。
Qiánlóng huángdì zài Běijīng chēngzūn jìwèi le。
The Emperor Qian Long succeeded the throne and proclaimed himself emperor in Beijing.
雍正皇帝传位于爱新觉罗弘历，也就是乾隆皇帝。
Yōngzhèng huángdì chuánwèi yú Àixīnjuéluó Hónglì，yě jiùshì Qiánlóng huángdì。
The Emperor Yongzheng passed on his leadership to Aixinjueluo Hongli, also called Emperor Qianlong.

Tā yì chūxiàn，jìzhěmen dàhūlóng de yìchōng ér shàng。
No sooner had he appeared than the journalists moved towards him.
这座佛殿是乾隆年间修造的。
Zhèzuò fódiàn shì Qiánlóng niánjiān xiūzào de。
This temple was built in Emperor Qianlong\'s reign.
晚上，街上卡车的呼隆声吵得我们没法睡觉。
Wǎnshàng，jiēshàng kǎchē de hūlóngshēng chǎo de wǒmen méifǎ shuìjiào。
At night, the rumble of the trucks on the street made us unable to fall asleep.
在农村，接亲往往既隆重又热闹。
Zài nóngcūn，jiēqīn wǎngwǎng jì lóngzhòng yòu rènào。
In the countryside, the escorting of the bride to the groom\'s house is always a ceremonious event.
据说这个金冠是乾隆帝戴过的。
Jùshuō zhège jīnguán shì Qiánlóngdì dàiguò de。
It is said that this gold crown belonged to Emperor Qianlong.
这座酒楼酒望高挂，生意兴隆。

The disputes on morals and ethics sparked by cloning technology will continue.

他龙庭隆起，一看便知是帝王之相。
Tā lóngtíng lóngqǐ，yíkàn biàn zhī shì dìwáng zhī xiàng。
He has a prominent forehead, which is a feature of an emperor.
我到他家作客，他隆情地招待了我。
Wǒ dào tā jiā zuòkè，tā lóngqíng de zhāodài le wǒ。
He was very hospitable when I went to his home.
新的一年，我祝大家生意隆盛。
Xīn de yì nián，wǒ zhù dàjiā shēngyì lóngshèng。
I wish you a prosperous business in the new year.

Lǐngdǎo yāoqiú kāimùshì búyào nòng de tài lóngshèng。
The leader demanded that the opening ceremony not be too grand.
看他那隆准，就知道他长大后准漂亮。
Kàn tā nà lóngzhǔn，jiù zhīdào tā zhǎngdà hòu zhǔn piàoliàng。
His prominent nose reveals that he will be a handsome man.
香港赛马会为示隆重，特别发行纪念封。

奥运会开幕式上，第一个节目是隆重的运动员入场式。

房后头净是碎砖，小心绊脚。
你别把那些闲言碎语放在心上。
嘴碎的人让人心烦。
to have a broken heart
心碎了
it was heartbreaking to watch
看着真让人心碎
Her sigh was heartbreaking.
Tā de tànxī lìngrénxīnsuì。
她的叹息令人心碎
I dashed over a vase by accident.
Wǒ yíbùxiǎoxīn dǎsuìle yí gè huāpíng。
我一不小心打碎了一个花瓶。
I was never careful with petty issues.
Wǒ cóngbù guānxīn nàxiē suǒsuì shìqing。
我从不关心那些琐碎事情。
I\'ve got this dicky heart.
Wǒ zhè kē yìsuì de xīn。
我这颗易碎的心。
A broken heart languishes here.
Yì kē pòsuì de xīn zàicǐ kūwěi。
一颗破碎的心在此枯萎。

这个花瓶易碎，拿的时候小心一点儿。
Breakable articles should be packed carefully.
Yìsuì de wùpǐn yīngdāng xiǎoxīn bāozhuāng hǎo。
易碎的物品应当小心包装好。
Be careful not to break that bell-jar.
小心别把那个钟型罩给打碎了。

当心别把那个贵重的花瓶打碎了。

He cut the letter up into a hundred pieces.
他把信剪得粉碎。

小心别把那个钟型罩给打碎了。

熔岩流可以烧毁，粉碎并埋葬沿途的所有东西。
Last night someone broke my wing mirror.
昨晚有人打碎了我的后视镜。
Give me something to wipe the crumbs off the table.
给我个东西，擦掉桌上的碎面包屑。

她很仔细地把花瓶碎片粘合起来，好让妈妈瞧不出接痕来。
Oh no, I just broke a pair of glasses.
噢，不，我刚打碎了一副眼镜。

暴风雨将船体击成碎片。
My sunglasses were in pieces.
我的太阳镜碎了。
Be careful, don\'t pull my glass to pieces.
小心点儿，别把我的玻璃杯弄碎了。
Be careful not to damage the priceless vase.
当心别把那个贵重的花瓶打碎了。
Don\'t drop that vase!
不要把那个花瓶摔碎了！
The two cars and the bikes between them have been run over by the train.
火车碾碎了两辆汽车和两辆车之间的几辆自行车。

昨天我把奶奶眼镜的一块镜片打碎了，她很生气。
This vase is fragile, please handle it with care.
这个花瓶易碎，拿的时候小心一点儿。

骨瓷制作工艺简单，强度高，较之硬瓷更不易摔碎，所以在很多国家骨瓷是最受欢迎的瓷器。

碎纸

把磨碎的奶酪加入酱汁中。

破碎

爆炸的力量击碎了窗玻璃。

it was heartbreaking to watch
看着真让人心碎
it broke into pieces
它碎成一片片的了

很抱歉打碎了你的花瓶，我会做出补偿的。

零碎活儿
línɡsuìhuór 
odd jobs

Zhèxiē língsuì dōngxi hěn zhàn dìfang。
These odds and ends take up a lot of space.
她正在拾掇零碎儿。
Tā zhèngzài shíduo língsuìr。

Bǎ zhèshì yíqìr jiějué le ba，bié língqiāosuìdǎ le。
Let\'s settle the matter at one stroke, not piecemeal. or Let\'s do this at one go, not bit by bit.
这几天零打碎敲，我的开销也不小呢。
Zhè jǐtiān língdǎ suìqiāo，wǒ de kāixiāo yě bùxiǎo ne。
Though little by little, I have spent plenty of money these days.

When he tidied the room up, he put the odds and ends into a miscellaneous box.
我建议你把作业一次做完，别零敲碎打。
Wǒ jiànyì nǐ bǎ zuòyè yícì zuòwán，bié língqiāosuìdǎ.

Suǒwèi“huózhì”，tā shì zìránjiè zhōng zhǔyào yóu dànbáizhì gòuchéng bìng jùyǒu shēngzhǎng、fāyù、fánzhí děng nénglì de wùtǐ。

flourishing cultural undertakings

古罗马文明在欧洲和地中海周围繁荣起来。
这把刀的弓背上刻着几个繁体字。
Zhèbǎ dāo de gōngbèi shàng kè zhe jǐgè fántǐzì。
The curved back of this knife is carved with several Chinese characters in the complex form.
繁体的“机”字，笔划很多。
Fántǐ de “jī”zì，bǐhuà hěnduō。
The original form of &quot;机&quot; has many strokes.
他练书法时临摹的字帖都是繁体。
Tā liàn shūfǎ shí línmó de zìtiē dōushì fántǐ。
He practiced writing original forms of characters from a copybook of calligraphy.
繁体字
繁体字。
他的作品不讲究文字繁丽，着意于整体效果。
繁体的“机”字，笔划很多。
Fántǐ de “jī”zì，bǐhuà hěnduō。

Tā liàn shūfǎ shí línmó de zìtiē dōushì fántǐ。
He practiced writing original forms of characters from a copybook of calligraphy.

Zhèbǎ dāo de gōngbèi shàng kè zhe jǐgè fántǐzì。
The curved back of this knife is carved with several Chinese characters in the complex form.
所谓“活质”，它是自然界中主要由蛋白质构成并具有生长、发育、繁殖等能力的物体。
Suǒwèi“huózhì”，tā shì zìránjiè zhōng zhǔyào yóu dànbáizhì gòuchéng bìng jùyǒu shēngzhǎng、fāyù、fánzhí děng nénglì de wùtǐ。
Living objects are those that are constituted of proteins and have the ability to grow, develop and breed.
当妻子的最能体会家务事的繁琐了。
Dāng qīzi de zuì néng tǐhuì jiāwùshì de fánsuǒ le。
A wife can best understand the tedious nature of housework.

繁体字。
写简体，不要写繁体。
从繁重的体力劳动中解脱出来。
他的作品不讲究文字繁丽，着意于整体效果。
The village has a tiny harbour, the busy centre of a local fishing community.
Zhège cūnzi yǒu yí gè xiǎo gǎngkǒu，shì dāngdì yúmín tuántǐ de fánmáng de Màoyì zhōngxīn。
这个村子有一个小港口，是当地渔民团体的繁忙的贸易中心。
Phage uses the bacterium\'s machinery and energy to produce more phage until the bacterium is destroyed and phage is released to invade surrounding bacteria.
Shìjūntǐ lìyòng xìjūn de shēngcúnjīzhì hé néngliàng lái fánzhí gèngduō shìjūntǐ，zhízhì bèi qīnrù de xìjūn huǐmiè，ránhòu zhuǎn\'ér zài qù qīnhài zhōuwéi de xìjūn。
噬菌体利用细菌的生存机制和能量来繁殖更多噬菌体，直至被侵入的细菌毁灭，然后转而再去侵害周围的细菌。
这个城市越来越繁盛了。
Zhège chéngshì yuèláiyuè fánshèng le。
The city is becoming more and more prosperous.
近古是我国戏曲和小说的繁盛期。
Jìngǔ shì wǒguó xìqǔ hé xiǎoshuō de fánshèngqī。
The period between the 10th and mid-19th centuries was a flowering period for dramas and novels.
原来繁盛一时的大院现如今变得荆榛满地。
Yuánlái fánshèng yìshí de dàyuàn xiànrújīn biàn de jīngzhēn mǎndì。
The once thriving yard is now almost deserted and covered with weeds and bushes.
夏季的草原，草木菁菁，一片繁盛的景象。
Xiàjì de cǎoyuán，cǎomù jīngjīng，yí piàn fánshèng de jǐng xiàng。
The meadow in summer is covered with green grass and looks lush.

gēchàng zǔguó de fánróng chāngshèng

The market is becoming brisker day by day.
现在市场繁荣，到处都有入眼货。

The market is flourishing, and there are so many things to attract the buyer.

Shìmiàn fánróng。

fánróng

Bǎijiāzhēngmíng de júmiàn yǒulìyú kēxué de fánróng。

希望我们的国家繁荣兴旺，长盛不衰。
Xīwàng wǒmen de guójiā fánróng xīngwàng，chángshèng bùshuāi。

Wǒmen zhèlǐ shì shuǐhàn liǎnglù de jiāotōng shūniǔ，suǒyǐ shāngyè hěnfánróng。
It is a transport junction for both land and water here, so business is bustling.
广开贤路才能使一个国家繁荣安定。
Guǎngkāi xiánlù cáinéng shǐ yígè guójiā fánróng āndìng。
Only by openning up the channel for able and worthy people can a country prosper.
中心区由于曾是县治，因此经济比较繁荣。
Zhōngxīnqū yóuyú céng shì xiànzhì，yīncǐ jīngjì bǐjiào fánróng。
The central district used to be the county seat, therefore its economy is prosperous.
19世纪末的中国已经日益腐朽，20世纪末的中国开始渐渐繁荣。
19 shìjìmò de Zhōngguó yǐjīng rìyì fǔxiǔ，20 shìjìmò de Zhōngguó kāishǐ jiànjiàn fánróng。
China at the end of the 19th century was deteriorating, but it was beginning to prosper at the end of the 20th century.
经济在繁荣。

这个国家正迈着缓慢稳健的步伐，走向繁荣。
There are no short cuts to building a new prosperity.
Chuàngjiàn qiánsuǒwèiyǒu de fánróng shì méiyǒu jiéjìng kě zǒu de。
创建前所未有的繁荣是没有捷径可走的。

向着发展和繁荣，他们开始了缓慢而艰难的行进。
Thanks to his efforts, the empire has flourished during his reign.

The current boom in the economy sucked many workers in from abroad.

目前的经济繁荣吸引了许多国外工人。
The oil boom enriched a lot of local people.
Shíyóuyè de fánróng ràng xǔduō dāngdìrén fāle dà cái。
石油业的繁荣让许多当地人发了大财。
The industry enjoyed a boom.
Zhège hángyè zhèngzài xiǎngshòu fánróng。
这个行业正在享受繁荣。
That housing boom has turned to bust.

fánmáng de shōuhuò jìjié
the busy harvest season
工作繁忙
gōngzuò fánmáng
be very busy with one\'s work; be busily engaged

jūnwù fánmáng

nóngshì fánmáng

事务繁忙
shìwù fánmáng

到了工地，一派繁忙的景象展现在我们眼前。
Dào le gōngdì，yípài fánmáng de jǐng xiàng zhǎnxiàn zài wǒmen yǎnqián。
As we reached the construction site, a scene of bustling activity presented itself before our eyes.
因为工作繁忙，他们结婚多年不育。
Yīnwéi gōngzuò fánmáng，tāmen jiéhūn duōnián búyù。
They did not have a baby for many years because of their heavy amount of work.
由于最近业务繁忙，公司决定调休。
Yóuyú zuìjìn yèwù fánmáng，gōngsī juédìng tiáoxiū。
The company decided to delay its rest days due to heavy business.
港口一片繁忙景象，来往船只风樯林立。
Gǎngkǒu yípiàn fánmáng jǐng xiàng，láiwǎng chuánzhǐ fēngqiáng línlì。
The port is crowded with ships coming and going.
他工作繁忙，每天漏夜才能到家。
Tā gōngzuò fánmáng，měitiān lòuyè cáinéng dàojiā。
He is very busy at work, and goes back home at midnight every day.
近年来公务繁忙，好久没有和老朋友们聚聚了。
Jìnniánlái gōngwù fánmáng，hǎo jiǔ méiyǒu hé lǎopéngyoumen jùjù le。
I have been busy working recently, I haven\'t been together with my friends for a long time.
每逢节日声讯台的业务就会异常繁忙。
Měiféng jiérì shēngxùntái de yèwù jiùhuì yìcháng fánmáng。
Information service centers are extremely busy during the holidays.
这个港口十分繁忙，所有的拖轮都在工作。
Zhège gǎngkǒu shífēn fánmáng，suǒyǒu de tuōlún dōu zài gōngzuò。
This harbor is very busy, all the tugboats are working.
虽然工作很繁忙，可他一直应付自如。
Suīrán gōngzuò hěn fánmáng，kě tā yìzhí yīngfù zìrú。
Though busy at work, he still manages to handle everything with ease.
京广线是中国最繁忙的铁路主干线之一。
Jīngguǎngxiàn shì Zhōngguó zuì fánmáng de tiělù zhǔgànxiàn zhīyī。
The Jingguang Line is one of the busiest major railways in China.
这个地区的公路交通繁忙而有序。
Zhège dìqū de gōnglù jiāotōng fánmáng ér yǒuxù.
Road traffic in the area is heavy but well-regulated.

Obviously, with such attractions in town, roads will be busy.

在交通繁忙的拐角处，警察都进行了限速。
His car shot forward onto a busy road.
Tā de chē fēisù shǐxiàng yì tiáo fánmáng de dàolù。
他的车飞速驶向一条繁忙的道路。
They were careful when crossing the busy street.
Tāmen zài chuānyuè fánmáng de mǎlù shí fēicháng xiǎoxīn。
他们在穿越繁忙的马路时非常小心。
Heavy traffic overloaded the trunk lines.
Fánmáng de jiāotōng ràng zhǔgàndào chāo fùhè yùnxíng。
繁忙的交通让主干道超负荷运行。
They were busily engaged in buying souvenirs.
Tāmen zài fēicháng fánmáng de cǎigòu jìniànpǐn。
他们在非常繁忙地采购纪念品。
He\'s buried under a heavy work schedule right now.
Tā xiànzài mángyú fánzhòng de gōngzuò zhīzhōng。
他现在忙于繁重的工作之中。
由简到繁
Yóujiǎn-dàofán
from simple to complex
繁芜的文字最好删减，这样文章才会显得简洁。
Fánwú de wénzì zuìhǎo shānjiǎn，zhèyàng wénzhāng cái huì xiǎnde jiǎnjié。
Unnecessary words should be removed to make the article more concise.
繁简得宜
删繁就简
删繁就简
以简驭繁。
繁琐的手续简单化了。
写简体，不要写繁体。
城里最繁华的地区
chénglǐ zuì fánhuá de dìqū
the busiest section of town; the downtown district
繁华
fánhuá
flourishing; bustling; busy
战争结束后，原本繁华的城市已是花草残败，一片萧条。
Zhànzhēng jiéshù hòu，yuánběn fánhuá de chéngshì yǐ shì huācǎo cánbài，yí piàn xiāotiáo。
After the war, the cities were in ruins.
入夜，灯市一片繁华。
Rùyè，dēngshì yípiàn fánhuá。
As night approached, the lantern fairs on Mid-Autumn Day became quite lively.
这座大厦地处北京最繁华的路段。
Zhèzuò dàshà dìchǔ Běijīng zuì fánhuá de lùduàn。
This building is located in the most bustling area in Beijing.
古代，关厢一带是这座城市最繁华的地方。
Gǔdài，guānxiāng yídài shì zhèzuò chéngshì zuì fánhuá de dìfāng。
In ancient times, the neighborhood outside the city gate was the most prosperous area of this city.
畿辅因为挨着国都一般都比较繁华。
Jīfǔ yīnwèi āi zhe guódū yìbān dōu bǐjiào fánhuá。
The district around the royal capital was generally prosperous due to its closeness to the capital.
深夜里，流莺依旧出入各条繁华的街道。
Shēnyè lǐ，liúyīng yījiù chūrù gè tiáo fánhuá de jiēdào。
Prostitutes still appear in all prosperous streets at night.
为了躲开伤心地，他流寓上海这座繁华的城市。
Wèile duǒkāi shāngxīndì，tā liúyù Shànghǎi zhèzuò fánhuá de chéngshì。
In order to leave the painful place, he went to Shanghai and lived in that prosperous city.
这篇文章浓墨重彩地描写了唐长安城的繁华。

The article describes Chang\'an\'s prosperity in the Tang dynasty in a rich and colorful manner.

Měitiān miànduì zhème fánrǒng de gōngzuò，tā rìjiàn xiāoshòu。
Faced with diverse and complex affairs, he is becoming thinner day by day.
这篇文章不仅语言繁冗，而且也没什么思想。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng bùjǐn yǔyán fánrǒng，érqiě yě méi shénme sīxiǎng。
This article is flowery in language but empty in content.
何必固执于这些繁缛条文呢，我们应该适当变通。
Hébì gùzhí yú zhèxiē fánrù tiáowén ne，wǒmen yīnggāi shìdàng biàntōng。
Why should we confine ourselves with all the over-elaborate rules and regulations? We should be more flexible.
当妻子的最能体会家务事的繁琐了。
Dāng qīzi de zuì néng tǐhuì jiāwùshì de fánsuǒ le。
A wife can best understand the tedious nature of housework.
繁体的“机”字，笔划很多。
Fántǐ de “jī”zì，bǐhuà hěnduō。
The original form of &quot;机&quot; has many strokes.
他练书法时临摹的字帖都是繁体。
Tā liàn shūfǎ shí línmó de zìtiē dōushì fántǐ。
He practiced writing original forms of characters from a copybook of calligraphy.
这篇文章语言繁芜，最好能再精炼一下。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng yǔyán fánwú，zuì hǎo néng zài jīngliàn yíxià。
This article is too wordy, it needs revision.
繁芜的文字最好删减，这样文章才会显得简洁。
Fánwú de wénzì zuìhǎo shānjiǎn，zhèyàng wénzhāng cái huì xiǎnde jiǎnjié。
Unnecessary words should be removed to make the article more concise.
夜空繁星点点，就像美丽的眼睛。
Yèkōng fánxīng diǎndiǎn，jiù xiàng měilì de yǎnjīng。
The sparkling stars in the sky are like pretty eyes.
这些繁言碎语，其实有着妈妈的良苦用心。
Zhèxiē fányán suìyǔ，qíshí yǒuzhe māmɑ de liángkǔ yòngxīn。
Mother\'s nagging actually demonstrated her deep love.
港口一片繁忙景象，来往船只风樯林立。
Gǎngkǒu yípiàn fánmáng jǐng xiàng，láiwǎng chuánzhǐ fēngqiáng línlì。
The port is crowded with ships coming and going.
这把刀的弓背上刻着几个繁体字。
Zhèbǎ dāo de gōngbèi shàng kè zhe jǐgè fántǐzì。
The curved back of this knife is carved with several Chinese characters in the complex form.
古代，关厢一带是这座城市最繁华的地方。
Gǔdài，guānxiāng yídài shì zhèzuò chéngshì zuì fánhuá de dìfāng。
In ancient times, the neighborhood outside the city gate was the most prosperous area of this city.
仙人掌可以在荒沙中成活并且繁衍生长。
Xiānrénzhǎng kěyǐ zài huāngshā zhōng chénghuó bìngqiě fányǎn shēngzhǎng。
Cactus can survive, and multiply in desolate deserts.
一些鱼类回游到此水段来繁殖后代。
Yìxiē yúlèi huíyóu dào cǐ shuǐduàn lái fánzhí hòudài。
Some fish migrate to this section of water to breed.
所谓“活质”，它是自然界中主要由蛋白质构成并具有生长、发育、繁殖等能力的物体。
Suǒwèi“huózhì”，tā shì zìránjiè zhōng zhǔyào yóu dànbáizhì gòuchéng bìng jùyǒu shēngzhǎng、fāyù、fánzhí děng nénglì de wùtǐ。
Living objects are those that are constituted of proteins and have the ability to grow, develop and breed.
畿辅因为挨着国都一般都比较繁华。
Jīfǔ yīnwèi āi zhe guódū yìbān dōu bǐjiào fánhuá。
The district around the royal capital was generally prosperous due to its closeness to the capital.
这种寄生蜂是农民的好帮手，它可以抑制农业害虫的繁殖。
Zhèzhǒng jìshēngfēng shì nóngmín de hǎo bāngshǒu，tā kěyǐ yìzhì nóngyè hàichóng de fánzhí。
These parasitical wasps help the farmers a lot. They can control the breeding of agricultural insects.
过劳死的现象如此频繁真是令人嗟叹。
Guòláosǐ de xiàn xiàng rúcǐ pínfán zhēnshì lìngrén jiētàn。
How regretful that so many people kill themselves by working too much!
近古是我国戏曲和小说的繁盛期。
Jìngǔ shì wǒguó xìqǔ hé xiǎoshuō de fánshèngqī。
The period between the 10th and mid-19th centuries was a flowering period for dramas and novels.
根据生物学的研究，动物也不能近亲繁殖！
Gēnjù shēngwùxué de yánjiū，dòngwù yě bùnéng jìnqīn fánzhí！
According to biological studies, close breeding is not allowed, even for animals.
我们要避免职场中的“近亲繁殖”现象。
Wǒmen yào bìmiǎn zhíchǎng zhōng de“jìnqīn fánzhí”xiàn xiàng。
We must avoid the &quot;close breeding&quot; phenomenon in companies.
原来繁盛一时的大院现如今变得荆榛满地。
Yuánlái fánshèng yìshí de dàyuàn xiànrújīn biàn de jīngzhēn mǎndì。
The once thriving yard is now almost deserted and covered with weeds and bushes.
夏季的草原，草木菁菁，一片繁盛的景象。
Xiàjì de cǎoyuán，cǎomù jīngjīng，yí piàn fánshèng de jǐng xiàng。
The meadow in summer is covered with green grass and looks lush.
在卷帙浩繁的文学宝库中，《红楼梦》是一颗华美宝石。
Zài juànzhì hàofán de wénxué bǎokù zhōng，《Hónglóumèng》 shì yì kē huáměi bǎoshí。
A Dream of Red Mansions is a beautiful gemstone in the vast literature collection.
我们是老亲，不用讲究这些繁文缛节。
Wǒmen shì lǎoqīn，búyòng jiǎngjiū zhèxiē fánwén rùjié。
We are old relatives. Forget the red tape.
深夜里，流莺依旧出入各条繁华的街道。
Shēnyè lǐ，liúyīng yījiù chūrù gè tiáo fánhuá de jiēdào。
Prostitutes still appear in all prosperous streets at night.
为了躲开伤心地，他流寓上海这座繁华的城市。
Wèile duǒkāi shāngxīndì，tā liúyù Shànghǎi zhèzuò fánhuá de chéngshì。
In order to leave the painful place, he went to Shanghai and lived in that prosperous city.
他工作繁忙，每天漏夜才能到家。
Tā gōngzuò fánmáng，měitiān lòuyè cáinéng dàojiā。
He is very busy at work, and goes back home at midnight every day.
我抬头仰望，只见天空中罗布着点点繁星。
Wǒ táitóu yǎngwàng，zhǐjiàn tiānkōng zhōng luóbù zhe diǎndiǎn fánxīng。
I looked up and saw numerous stars scattered in the sky.
罗非鱼一年能够繁殖数代，生殖能力很强。
Luófēiyú yìnián nénggòu fánzhí shùdài，shēngzhí nénglì hěnqiáng。
Tilapia are very fertile, and reproduce several offspring every year.
近年来公务繁忙，好久没有和老朋友们聚聚了。
Jìnniánlái gōngwù fánmáng，hǎo jiǔ méiyǒu hé lǎopéngyoumen jùjù le。
I have been busy working recently, I haven\'t been together with my friends for a long time.
这篇文章浓墨重彩地描写了唐长安城的繁华。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng nóngmò zhòngcǎi de miáoxiě le Táng Chángānchéng de fánhuá。
The article describes Chang\'an\'s prosperity in the Tang dynasty in a rich and colorful manner.
红藻过度繁殖，我们必须尽早清库。
Hóngzǎo guòdù fánzhí，wǒmen bìxū jìnzǎo qīngkù。
The red algae are overproducing, we must clear the reservoir as soon as possible.
这里曾经是一条繁华的商业街。
Zhèlǐ céngjīng shì yìtiáo fánhuá de shāngyèjiē。
Here was once a prosperous commercial street.
每逢节日声讯台的业务就会异常繁忙。
Měiféng jiérì shēngxùntái de yèwù jiùhuì yìcháng fánmáng。
Information service centers are extremely busy during the holidays.
我们这里是水旱两路的交通枢纽，所以商业很繁荣。
Wǒmen zhèlǐ shì shuǐhàn liǎnglù de jiāotōng shūniǔ，suǒyǐ shāngyè hěnfánróng。
It is a transport junction for both land and water here, so business is bustling.
现在的速冻食品品种繁多，为我们的生活提供了方便。
Xiànzài de sùdòng shípǐn pǐnzhǒng fánduō，wèi wǒmen de shēnghuó tígōng le fāngbiàn。
There are many and various quick-frozen foods today, which provides great convenience for our lives.
旧时农户每年都要交纳繁重的田赋。
Jiùshí nónghù měinián dōuyào jiāonà fánzhòng de tiánfù。
In the past, all the peasant households had to hand in a lot of land tax every year.
这个港口十分繁忙，所有的拖轮都在工作。
Zhège gǎngkǒu shífēn fánmáng，suǒyǒu de tuōlún dōu zài gōngzuò。
This harbor is very busy, all the tugboats are working.
广开贤路才能使一个国家繁荣安定。
Guǎngkāi xiánlù cáinéng shǐ yígè guójiā fánróng āndìng。
Only by openning up the channel for able and worthy people can a country prosper.
中心区由于曾是县治，因此经济比较繁荣。
Zhōngxīnqū yóuyú céng shì xiànzhì，yīncǐ jīngjì bǐjiào fánróng。
The central district used to be the county seat, therefore its economy is prosperous.
在这繁华的大都市，能碰上乡人真不容易。
Zài zhè fánhuá de dàdūshì，néng pèngshàng xiāngrén zhēn bùróngyì。
It is very difficult to encounter a fellow villager in this big city.
这里以前是个繁华的闹市，只可惜现在草木萧疏。
Zhèlǐ yǐqián shì gè fánhuá de nàoshì，zhī kěxī xiànzài cǎomù xiāoshū。
This place used to be a crowed market, but it is deserted now.
树木繁茂，丫杈多得数不清。
Shùmù fánmào，yāchà duō de shǔbùqīng。
The tree is in full bloom and its forks are too many to count.
这里沿街都是商铺，很繁华。
Zhèlǐ yánjiē dōushì shāngpù，hěn fánhuá。
There are shops along the street, which make it look very prosperous.
叶枝繁茂，修剪一下会更好的。
Yèzhī fánmào，xiūjiǎn yíxià huì gènghǎo de。
The tree has luxuriant leaf branches, it would be better if you trimmed the branches.
虽然工作很繁忙，可他一直应付自如。
Suīrán gōngzuò hěn fánmáng，kě tā yìzhí yīngfù zìrú。
Though busy at work, he still manages to handle everything with ease.
细菌的繁殖速度快得令人咂舌。
Xìjūn de fánzhí sùdù kuài dé lìngrén zāshé。
The reproduction speed of bacteria is surprisingly fast.
你看这里，枝繁叶茂的景象让人看了心醉。
Nǐkàn zhèlǐ，zhīfán yèmào de jǐng xiàng ràng rén kàn le xīnzuì。
You see, the scene of the mass of branches and leaves is so fascinating.
狗的种属非常繁多。
Gǒu de zhǒng shǔ fēicháng fánduō。
Dogs have a variety of breeds.
花园中的花草，株型各异，种类繁多。
Huāyuán zhōng de huācǎo，zhūxíng gè yì，zhǒng lèi fánduō。
There are many species of flowers and grass in the varied garden.
京广线是中国最繁忙的铁路主干线之一。
Jīngguǎngxiàn shì Zhōngguó zuì fánmáng de tiělù zhǔgànxiàn zhīyī。
The Jingguang Line is one of the busiest major railways in China.
雌雄异株植物的繁殖方式多种多样。
Cíxióng yìzhū zhíwù de fánzhí fāngshì duōzhǒng duōyàng。
There are various reproduction modes for plants featuring in dioecism.
19世纪末的中国已经日益腐朽，20世纪末的中国开始渐渐繁荣。
19 shìjìmò de Zhōngguó yǐjīng rìyì fǔxiǔ，20 shìjìmò de Zhōngguó kāishǐ jiànjiàn fánróng。
China at the end of the 19th century was deteriorating, but it was beginning to prosper at the end of the 20th century.

她终于找到人把她带出这个森林了。
You\'ll have to hop over the fence into the woods.

我们必须得跃过栅栏，进入森林。
The wise woman lashed the carpet with the whip until it rose in the air and carried her to the forest.

这个聪明的女人用鞭子抽打着地毯，地毯升到了空中，把她带到森林。

They emerged from the woods onto a vast open plain.
Tāmen zǒuchū sēnlín，láidàole guǎngmào de píngyuán。

The hikers did not manage to penetrate the dense forest.

这群徒步旅行者没能成功地穿过这片浓密的森林。
The fire spared the forest floor.
Dàhuǒ méiyǒu shāodào sēnlín de dìbiǎo。
大火没有烧到森林的地表。
In these forests，mushrooms grow under the trees.

在这些森林中，蘑菇在树下遍地生长。
Falling trees make a sound in the forest even when no one is there to hear them.

The king used to hunt these forests.

He hacked his way through the forest.

他在森林中劈开一条道路。
The path twisted through the forest.

她正在恋爱，每天都把自己打扮得粉妆玉琢。
Tā zhèngzài liàn\'ài，měitiān dōu bǎ zìjǐ dǎbàn de fěnzhuāngyùzhuó。
She is dating someone and dresses up every day.
出门在外，他顾恋着家中的妻儿。
Chūmén zài wài，tā gùliàn zhe jiā zhōng de qīér。
Being away from home, he misses his wife and children very much.
他俩的这段畸恋给他以后的生活造成了很大的影响。
Tā liǎ de zhè duàn jīliàn gěi tā yǐhòu de shēnghuó zàochéng le hěndà de yǐngxiǎng。
Their abnormal love had a great impact on his future life.
谈恋爱可不能脚踩两只船。
Tánliàn\'ài kě bùnéng jiǎo cǎi liǎng zhī chuán。
One shall not build relationships with two people at the same time when they are in love.
她失恋了，我正在对她进行解劝。
Tā shīliàn le，wǒ zhèngzài duì tā jìnxíng jiěquàn。
She has been jilted and I am trying to console her.
请不要再迷恋金迷纸醉的生活了。
Qǐng búyào zài míliàn jīnmí zhǐzuì de shēnghuó le。
Do not cling to a life of luxury and dissipation.
为君王者，不可贪恋酒色。
Wéi jūnwáng zhě，bùkě tānliàn jiǔsè。
Kings and emperors should not indulge in wine and women.
初恋对她来说是刻骨镂心的。
Chūliàn duì tā láishuō shì kègǔ lòuxīn de。
Her first love is engraved in her mind.
他真是恋家，一周总要回去一趟。
Tā zhēnshì liànjiā，yì zhōu zǒng yào huíqù yí tàng。
He really loves his family, and returns home once a week.
他恋念着故乡，久久不能平静。
Tā liànniàn zhe gùxiāng，jiǔjiǔ bùnéng píngjìng。
He misses his hometown, and couldn\'t calm down for a long time.
他是个恋群的人，总是怀念以前一起生活学习过的室友。
Tā shì gè liànqún de rén，zǒngshì huáiniàn yǐqián yìqǐ shēnghuó xuéxí guò de shìyǒu。
He is attached to people around him, and always misses his roommates from when he was a student.
有些恋群的动物离开了群体以后很难生存。
Yǒuxiē liànqún de dòngwù líkāi le qúntǐ yǐhòu hěnnán shēngcún。
Some animals attached to the group can hardly survive when they leave.
这块土地滋养了我，恋土之情长伴心间。
Zhèkuài tǔdì zīyǎng le wǒ，liàntǔ zhī qíng chángbàn xīnjiān。
This area of soil has nurtured me. I always feel reluctant to leave my hometown.
海外的游子们无一日能释怀恋乡之情。
Hǎiwài de yóuzimen wú yí rì néng shìhuái liànxiāng zhī qíng。
Overseas travellers miss their hometown every day.
他恋栈而无能，只能采取非正常手段获取职权。
Tā liànzhàn ér wúnéng，zhǐnéng cǎiqǔ fēizhèngcháng shǒuduàn huòqǔ zhíquán。
He is unwilling to leave his official post but is incapable,so he can do nothing but obtain power by abnormal means.
恋战的后果就是前功尽弃。
Liànzhàn de hòuguǒ jiùshì qiángōngjìnqì。
The result of being bellicose is that all your previous efforts become wasted.
他时常回忆起那段镂骨铭心的恋情。
Tā shícháng huíyìqǐ nàduàn lùgǔ míngxīn de liànqíng。
He always recalls the love which is engraved in his mind.
他路遇了初恋情人，和她交谈了许久。
Tā lùyù le chūliàn qíngrén，hé tā jiāotán le xǔjiǔ。
He met his first love on the road and chatted with her for a long time.
他想谈一场罗曼司的恋爱，可是事与愿违。
Tā xiǎng tán yìchǎng luómànsī de liàn\'ài，kěshì shìyǔ yuànwéi。
He wanted to have a romantic love, but things didn\'t go as he wished.
失恋后，他总是去小酒馆买醉。
Shīliàn hòu,tā zǒngshì qù xiǎojiǔguǎn mǎizuì.
He always bought liquor and drank greatly after failure in love.
失恋以后，他觉得痛苦难言。
Shīliàn yǐhòu，tā juédé tòngkǔ nányán。
After the failure in love, he is in extreme pain.
既然感情已经不在了，仳离之后又何必留恋？
Jìrán gǎnqíng yǐjing búzài le，pǐlí zhīhòu yòu hébì liúliàn？
Now that love has gone, there is no need for you to be reluctant to leave after your divorce.
恋爱婚姻需要男女双方自愿，怎么能抢婚呢？
Liànài hūnyīn xūyào nánnǚ shuāngfāng zìyuàn，zěnme néng qiǎnghūn ne？
A love match should be at the wishes of both sides, how can they grab a bride?
我们鼓励正常的交往，反对三角恋爱。
Wǒmen gǔlì zhèngcháng de jiāowǎng，fǎnduì sānjiǎoliàn\'ài。
We encourage normal intercourse, and oppose love triangles.
由于年轻时忙于工作、学习，他只能晚恋了。
Yóuyú niánqīng shí mángyú gōngzuò、xuéxí，tā zhǐnéng wǎnliàn le。
Busy studying and working in his youth, he could only begin romance at an older age.
一对恋人正偎傍在草丛中，不知在说些什么。
Yí duì liànrén zhèng wēibàngzài cǎocóng zhōng，bùzhī zài shuō xiē shénme。
A couple of lovers are snuggling up together in the grass, I don\'t know what they are talking about.
一对恋人在火车站依依不舍，最终还是吻别了。
Yí duì liànrén zài huǒchēzhàn yīyībùshě，zuì zhōng háishi wěnbié le。
The pair of lovers were reluctant to leave each other at the train station, but finally kissed goodbye.
这对即将分别的恋人彼此相顾，良久不发一言。
Zhè duì jíjiāng fēnbié de liànrén bǐcǐ xiānggù，liángjiǔ bùfā yìyán。
The lovers who are going to part look at each other without saying a word.
他们相恋多年，但最终还是分手了。
Tāmen xiāngliàn duōnián，dàn zuì zhōng háishi fēnshǒu le。
They loved each other for many years, but eventually broke up.
情人节把思恋遥寄给远方的爱人。
Qíngrénjié bǎ sīliàn yáojì gěi yuǎnfāng de àirén。
Send your thoughts to a far-away lover on Saint Valentine\'s Day.
她大骂他移情别恋，喜欢上别的女人。
Tā dàmà tā yíqíng biéliàn，xǐhuanshàng bié de nǚrén。
She cursed him for shifting his love to another woman.
老师和家长总是担心孩子早恋。
Lǎoshī hé jiācháng zǒngshì dānxīn háizi zǎoliàn。
Teachers and parents are worried that the chilren may fall in love at an early age.
失恋后，她精神处于崩溃边缘。
Shīliànhòu，tā jīngshén chǔyú bēngkuì biānyuán。
After the break-up she was close to nervous breakdown.
初恋
chūliàn
first love
恋爱中的男女很少介意对方的缺点。
Liàn\'àizhōngde nánnǚ hěnshǎo jièyì duìfāngde quēdiǎn。
People who are in love rarely mind about their partner\'s weaknesses.
失恋的女孩儿把男朋友的信付之一炬。
Shīliànde nǚháir bǎ nánpéngyǒude xìn fùzhīyíjù。
The jilted girl burned all her boyfriend\'s letters.
经过3年的恋爱，他们终于结婚了。
Jīngguò sānnián de liàn\'ài，tāmen zhōngyú jiéhūnle.
Having been together for three years, they finally got married.

xiāngliàn

sānjiǎo liàn\'ài

He then converted his only successful kick of the match.

Touchdowns count as seven points, while defensive interceptions count as three.

塞满
to pack sb/sth into sth
把某人/某物塞满某物
to be packed tight
[suitcase+] 塞满

to cram sth with {or} full of sth
用某物将某物塞得满满的
It was chock-a-block full.
Zhèli bèi sāi de mǎnmǎn de。
这里被塞得满满的。
to force an article into a filled box
把一物品硬塞进盛满东西的盒中

他背地里塞给我十美元贿赂我。
to slip sth to sb, slip sb sth
tōu tōu jiāng mǒu wù sāigěi mǒu rén
偷偷将某物塞给某人
This job was put on me I didn\'t ask for it.
Zhège gōngzuò shì bèi qiáng sāigěi wǒ de，bú shì wǒ yào de。
这个工作是被强塞给我的，不是我要的。
He slipped me the key when nobody was looking.
Méi rén kànjiàn de shíhou，tā bǎ yàoshi tōutōu sāi gěi wǒ。
没人看见的时候，他把钥匙偷偷塞给我。
He foisted his work on me.
Tā bǎ tā de gōngzuò qiángsāi gěi le wǒ。
他把他的工作强塞给了我。

我给我的猫起名叫塞勒姆。

他们会给这孩子起名叫塞缪尔。
